And an 8$ processing fee because a computer (not a human) is taking my order. And tax is only 2$!!!!! That‚Äôs robbery. That‚Äôs a whole other ticket!!!!! This isn‚Äôt right. And it needs to stop. No human person is being inconvenienced in any way yet I am being charged for booking my own tickets?!!! We need to start boycotting corporations for this organized crime
Title: Hidden fees

Content: Every time I open ticketmaster, I get signed out and an error message blocks me from logging back in. I have to redownload every time I need to view my tickets.  Please fix this, thank you for being great otherwise!
Title: Love the app but having a problem

Content: I downloaded the app for one main purpose - to open the tickets I purchased. It couldn‚Äôt even do that and there‚Äôs no easy way to contact support. It takes you to an FAQ page where you scroll to the bottom and can click a button to contact support‚Ä¶. Which then takes you back to the same exact FAQ page. Extremely annoying and waste of time. I never write reviews but this is so ridiculous I had to.
Title: Website is terrible.. app is worse

Content: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE SERVICE AFTER THEY STOLE MY MONEY!!!!  I went to order 2 tickets for one event and was charged for 3 extra tickets for an unrelated event (that I NEVER purchased tickets from, or even looked at). All 3 tickets were in different areas of this concert and I was charged over $350!!! ONTOP of me purchasing 2 tickets for a completely separate event.  I NEVER PURCHASED THESE RANDOM TICKETS!!   I‚Äôve contacted support multiple times trying to explain that i never purchased them, that i cannot go to this event and that i was OVERCHARGED but they REFUSE to refund me saying ‚Äúenjoy your event‚Äù and ‚Äúsorry for the inconvenience‚Äù even though I NEVER BOUGHT THEM. I‚Äôm now out that money, cannot go to the event OR resell these tickets.  DISGUSTED with Ticketmaster and NEVER using this app or company again.  DO NOT USE TICKETMASTER UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE STOLEN FROM AND TAKEN ADVANTAGE OF!!!!!
Title: DO NOT USE- THEY STOLE MY MONEY

Content: Ticket master has always been shady but there is always something  new with them. Beware if you sell your tickets through the app or website they will hold your money until you provide all of your personal info including full social security number. They will NOT PAY until you do this. Even then they say you will get paid in 7-10 days but they don‚Äôt tell you it‚Äôs 7-10 days AFTER THE EVENT.
Title: Always shady

Content: Love the interface, but add the options to pay with Apple Pay or credit card at the bottom of the payment screen. It‚Äôs confusing to go through Apple payment first before completing the payment screen.
Title: Amazing revamp

Content: Buying BTS tickets was so much less stressful than people said it would be. I waited in the pre-queue, and then was transferred into the queue and only had to wait 45 minutes till I was able to pick tickets. I got pretty good seats and for a good price too. So much easier than other ticket purchasing sites.
Title: BTS Tickets

Content: Bought tickets for a concert that got cancelled by covid and rescheduled multiple times. Couldn‚Äôt resell tickets even though I can see resellers for the event on their app. Tried customer service and they wouldn‚Äôt explain why I couldn‚Äôt sell. One gave me a fake phone number to get help which is hilariously trash. Finally got one that said they couldn‚Äôt allow me to resell because Ticketmaster didn‚Äôt even own the ticket and was just facilitating a transaction for another service.
Title: Customer Service Trolls

Content: I purchased 2 tickets to a hockey game and was charged 2 times for them. ‚ÄúCommon problem with ticket master‚Äù. And you can not just call them up because they do not have anyone working the phones so it tells you to e-mail them. That‚Äôs not as easy as you would think and might take days as well. I still have not received my refund. Will not be using Ticketmaster again until they have staff to fix the problems when they arise.
Title: All kinds of problems

Content: okay, so I was going purchase tickets to the trippie red concert, so I kept checking to see if the tickets were still available(bc I was going to be on the main floor in the front.)However this time when I went to go purchase the tickets the app sighed me out of my account and banned me from using it bc the app thought I was a bot. So I go to customer service and and it didn‚Äôt help me at all. So I jus went ahead and deleted my whole account and here I am now‚Ä¶ absolutely an awful app.üòê
Title: THIS APP IS SO ANNOYING

Content: Around March last year 2020 before the pandemic I purchased $200 tickets for a concert in April 2020, of course it was canceled but they would refuse to give my money back. The band have not  said anything, just that it was postponed but Ticketmaster should still give us the option to opt out!! It‚Äôs frustrating because it‚Äôs about to be almost a year and I still haven‚Äôt been able to get a refund!
Title: Ticketmaster would not give a refund

Content: A good resource to have, but the inability of the app to talk to your phone‚Äôs credit card storage or to update your contact info all at once is frustrating. The interface when inputting address information is a little odd, returning to the top of the page each time you update a field. Also, allowing, encouraging and profiting off of ticket scalping is discouraging, but it‚Äôs a monopoly, so if you want to go to concerts or shows, I guess there‚Äôs no other options.
Title: An unfortunate necessity

Content: I have been using Ticketmaster for quite a number of years. In the past ordering online was difficult. Today‚Äôs order was quick and without snafus. Whatever changes were made to the website resulted in a very favorable experience. Kudos.
Title: Service much improved

Content: The app made it easy for me to buy wheelchair accessible seating which is not easy. Many people buy these tickets and resell them. The venue in conjunction with the app gave me the opportunity to by handicapped seating. I have Multiple Sclerosis and it is nice to not have to jump through hoops to buy a couple of seats to enjoy one of my favorite bands. Normalcy...priceless!
Title: Dave Matthews Band... Mike, Forest Hills NYC

Content: Unable to order tickets on my desktop computer: you made me go to my phone: ridiculous! Also you say tickets are $130 each and I am paying $340. Taxes and fees should not be  $80. Rip off! Other ticket agencies are up front with their fees!  I will reconsider another ticket scalper or ticket agency next time. Your ugly I‚Äôm in a rush now. Been doing this on and off since 2:00 pm 6 hours in between appointments.  So deceiving!!! Your tickets prices are wrong
Title: Paid way more than what the ticket said!!!!!

Content: I never write app reviews but TM is worth it. No better than the bad old days of having to refresh your browser window a thousand times to try and get in, and a countdown so short you barely have time to confirm with friends before you have to hit ‚Äúpurchase‚Äù or try again. A new low is having to go all the way through to the payment page to see what seat numbers you‚Äôve been allocated to. I groan every time an event I want to go to is selling through TM and would almost rather buy resale tickets to avoid the palaver.
Title: As bad as ever

Content: Love the new improvements.  Navigation so easy and intuitive.  When I thought I couldn‚Äôt get seats for a pre-sale event, lo and behold I received a notification 3 days later that took me to the list of available seats.  Location, price, package all very easy to see.  Nice work on this version.
Title: Newest version best experience yet

Content: I might be categorized as disabled but can‚Äôt use a wheelchair. The tickets I wound up with are nosebleeds on the farthest end of the venue. Not near a bathroom, not near the entrance, in the far corner where I‚Äôll have to walk up many many stairs, and crank my broken neck to watch the show... I‚Äôm just ready to cry. I guess what I thought was true really is true. Disabled people just can‚Äôt go to shows. I‚Äôll try and make the best of it for my son, I guess. I had written down the sections I wanted, but I wasn‚Äôt even given a choice. I probably won‚Äôt do this again.
Title: I‚Äôm bummed out

Content: I arrived at a concert and realized I had forgotten to bring the tickets. Since I bought the tickets from Ticketmaster I was able to download the app and take screenshots of the tickets. I was able to enjoy my meal instead of taking a cab back to the hotel. Thank you!
Title: Your app just saved me time, money and hassle

Content: I would recommend anyone buying tickets to any event to purchase through ticket master. I‚Äôve went to multiple concerts and bought multiple tickets. It‚Äôs safe and trusted I don‚Äôt have to worry about my money basically being robbed.
Title: Review

Content: Send out presale codes (that don‚Äôt work) then has everyone waiting in the queue for 4 hours, pauses it multiple times, then says that they weren‚Äôt expecting this many people? Tells you the tickets are yours for 10 minutes in checkout then kicks you to the back of the line after you‚Äôve already ‚Äúchecked out‚Äù? Bold move to monopolize the ticketing industry then not be able to do anything you‚Äôre supposed to do.
Title: Why are the fees nuts if the site doesn‚Äôt work?

Content: Trying to purchase Accessible Seats and there is zero Assistance and chat is constantly failing. For what we are paying we need to ensure we aren‚Äôt having issues and or getting the attention we need. Please have rep call me or text me about today‚Äôs game! SMH
Title: Accessible Tickets

Content: No phone number to call - the help either citing order does not work.  I clicked it so many times and get an ‚Äúunable to connect‚Äù and basically keep trying back in a few minutes pop up.  I sold tickets two months ago and still have not been paid!
Title: Why is it so hard to get customer service?

Content: Ticketmaster scammed me out of $200. My event was rescheduled and they offered me a refund. After a month passed and I still hadn‚Äôt received my refund, they informed me I would not be getting a refund. The rescheduled event had already passed so I wasn‚Äôt even able to sell my tickets or try to make it to the actual event.   There‚Äôs no way to contact them directly, they would not even answer my questions over chat. They take days to respond and give generic answers. I deleted my account.
Title: Ticketmaster is a scam

Content: If you want to get screwed over use Ticketmaster. Got into the presale for Bruce Springsteen and the cheapest ticket was $250 plus after they kept raising prices. We found 2 for $100 and when I clicked on them and said I had them reserved they sold them out from me when I went to the payment page. Ticketmaster wants to screw everyone. It is impossible to go to a show using Ticketmaster. Do not use this app. They sold tickets out from under us and will do the same to you
Title: Price gouging

Content: The app hasn‚Äôt worked in weeks. The tickets I have purchased won‚Äôt show on the app. On the online mobile site they say I can add them to my apple wallet. Clicking the link doesn‚Äôt work. So I have to open the mobile site on a web browser to present my ticket. For the mark up in ticket cost and suggesting their app is the way to go this is ridiculous! If they didn‚Äôt have a monopoly on tickets I‚Äôd never use Ticketmaster. Get with the 2020s and fix your app.
Title: Horrible and unuseful

Content: So far the cell phone technology has worked smoothly. When I walked up to enter Raymond James Stadium yesterday I only had 4% power showing on my phone. What would have happened if my phone had been dead? Nonetheless, all went well. I hope ticket selling at the game is not destroyed by this technology.
Title: So Far

Content: It was a breeze selecting our seats and the whole billing process, I definitely would have liked my phone tickets first before choosing to write a review and I think the processing fee is a bit steep per ticket but I‚Äôm hoping the whole experience will for see all of this.
Title: Smooth and easy

Content: It is hard that you have to keep the page active when purchasing tickets and then had to verify credit card and then you loose your tickets they need to fix that for the app
Title: Difficult with credit card

Content: The app functions fine. Relatively easy to use but can be a pain to navigate.  On the other hand, the fees I was just charged are beyond ridiculous. A 26% fee per ticket + an additional 5% fee (32% fee for 2 tickets @ $45 each). I basically almost paid for an additional ticket. This is highway robbery that apparently is perfectly legal but shady AF. Thanks for the monopoly and congrats on being one of the most hated companies in America.
Title: App ok, ticket fees are a messed up AF

Content: Got through the queue, chose my tickets. So many times I was told someone already bought them. Then I started getting messages telling me I couldn‚Äôt order from my device and to try to log in again from a laptop or phone. I‚Äôm ON my iPhone. Persistence and patience endured and I finally succeeded!. Through 50+ error messages, I kept trying and finally secured tickets. Don‚Äôt give up! Praise the good Lord!!!
Title: Horrible app

Content: While you can use this app to display tickets you have purchased, it is garbage for buying tickets. I have made it all the way through the queue, selected tickets, been told that someone else got them but would I like these instead, only to be sent back to the queue when I said yes.   I also have made it all the way through to the ticket selection to then be told I can‚Äôt buy the tickets on my device, an iPhone with a updated app that I am fully logged into and verified.
Title: Terrible app from a terrible company

Content: Downloading was easy, but it wouldn‚Äôt take the state, even from drop down menu. Called customer service, said it would take 15 minutes and only for those who bought tickets already. There is no help with app problems! I used PayPal instead
Title: App problem

Content: I‚Äôm usually very vocal when a mobile experience is problematic.  Causing everything from missed seats to double purchases. It was with some trepidation I opted to attempt this purchase via a mobile device. What a pleasant surprise. It worked perfectly and quickly!   5 stars!
Title: Happy Customer

Content: I really hate the newest platform Ticketmaster is using for online and app sales. It seems like it‚Äôs far harder to get tickets than it used to be, it‚Äôs slower, and today it‚Äôs simply not working at all. Go to the app, tells me I have to use a different device. Go to the website, tells me I have to use a different device. It‚Äôs horrible that they have a practical monopoly. Their fees are outrageous, and I‚Äôd expect the platform to at least allow me to purchase tickets in a stress fee manner for the amount they charge.
Title: Fancier does not equal better

Content: I am so very tired of trying to convince this App and website where I live. I do Not care who is coming to South Carolina. I have tried to change my location to Memphis/Little Rock so many times. I am just giving up and reduced to complaining, which goes against my always good karma.
Title: I do not live and have never lived in South Carolina.

Content: Buying a ticket shouldn‚Äôt be so difficult customer support is virtually nonexistent. The 800 number tells you it‚Äôs recording the call for possible training services. I call BS, there is plenty of learning that could be done if they listened to the frustration their clients are experiencing. Like talking to a wall, a not so smart wall.  The 800 sales number is worse than the support number or the app. So I have increased the app to 2 stars customer service 1 star Sales 0 Stars
Title: The App is a one star the 800 number a Zero Star

Content: I spent too long in trying to buy tkts on website and using app. The refresh takes you back to beginning. The back arrow same thing. I tried to buy premium parking and it was not an option for print at home but not a way to change the option. Now we do not have best parking for my mom.
Title: Too many attempts to purchase

Content: Super quick and easy to use! Just sign in, set up payment info, get in the waiting room, and it automatically refreshes when you‚Äôre in the queue and when it‚Äôs your turn. Check out was a breeze!
Title: Super easy to use

Content: My friends and I wanted to purchase Milwaukee Admirals tickets. We were initially pleased to find 3 $19 tickets 3 rows up from the ice. I added the tickets to my cart which initially displayed the price as $57, however when I went to check out the price shot up to over $85. Ticketmaster added nearly $10 in fees to each ticket. There exists no need to charge the consumer these absurd ‚Äúfees‚Äù other than corporate greed on the behalf of ticket master. They are a needless middleman who upcharges consumers nearly 150%. This is blatant price gouging and should be illegal.
Title: Would never recommend to anyone

Content: This app is very bad. I wanted to buy a ticket to my game, I clicked the game I wanted, however, somewhere in the middle there was an error and I had to restart the process. Cleverly, the first game ad was with the same teams and place that I wanted, but 2 months later. I didn't see and bought it. Right after I bought it, I realized the mistake and tried to contact them, but they said they could not reimburse me. I bought a ticket to a future date that I would not be in the country. And I think Ticketmaster tricked me on purpose. So, be careful!!!
Title: Worst app ever

Content: I don‚Äôt know how these crooks have become the official ticket selling service of all my favorite bands. I have had to use ticketmaster several times cause there is no other option, but my last experience was the worst. I couldn‚Äôt buy tickets for Iron Maiden in Quebec City cause they were not accepting another payment method other than American Express. I had to buy tickets for a show in Montreal. Changed my plans because of a stupid payment gateway.
Title: Really bad service

Content: I hate this app with every cell in my body. As a Penn state student, football tickets are very hard to get. They sell out quick, this is now 2 years in a row now In which it was my turn to purchase the tickets before they sold out and it popped up with a message stating ‚Äúsorry, something went wrong, please rejoin the queue‚Äù and then u guessed it, I fall all the way to the back of the line. I hate this app and I‚Äôm disgusted this is what my school uses to purchase tickets off of
Title: Crash

Content: Aloha I can‚Äôt believe it‚Äôs so hard to purchase tickets for events, Lakers and Kings was the most difficult tickets to buy. Took me a day and a half. The website kept crashing not letting any purchases to go through then it holds the cost for the tickets I never got in my account. This system needs to be upgraded or fixed!!! Poor service and no person to talk to be you charge us outrageous prices for fees that should cover a person there. ü•≤
Title: Website crashing

Content: Both on my PC and mobile app. Tried over 8 times to buy tickets and had continued technical issues on Ticket Master‚Äôs end. Kept thinking I was a bot. Couldn‚Äôt run my credit card info (until I stored it, which I hate doing). Wouldn‚Äôt release the tickets after each failed attempt which meant I had to wait hours to try and get them again.   Nothing but problems.
Title: Nothing but problems

Content: I created an account to purchase tickets to a concert, I bought tickets and later as the concert got closer I went to see if I could forward them to my friend. NOPE I couldn‚Äôt log into my account I hadn‚Äôt changed my Email or password the app just kept saying ‚Äúwe need to try your request again‚Äù I tried resetting my password but that didn‚Äôt work either. Tried to contact customer support they were unavailable might as well not exist.

Content: You can easily buy tickets through this app, but when it comes to selling your tickets- this app is not helpful at all.  You have to sell them using your computer/laptop. Once you get them up for sale, the app doesn‚Äôt update and show the tickets you‚Äôre trying to sell. Very inconvenient when you have to use your computer to everything but buying.
Title: Not functional

Content: Attempted to purchase these tickets multiple times, only to find out I had to use the app and then only to learn that the two seats I wanted couldn‚Äôt be purchased unless I also purchased the single seat next to us, because it was a 3 seat group. Nothing stated that until I was ready to check out. Really disappointing that I couldn‚Äôt purchase the original seats and then I could only do it from the app and not my computer.
Title: Only able to use app

Content: I know life isn‚Äôt fair‚Ä¶ But we were trying to buy tickets for a comedy show in Buffalo. We were very excited so we set alarms for when the tickets were dropped so then we can make sure to get a ticket. When we signed on exactly at 10 o‚Äôclock, when the tickets went on sale. The bots already bought all of the tickets and re-sold them for double the price. Kind of messed up that actual human beings are trying to buy tickets, but computers buy them all first.
Title: Not fair

Content: I‚Äôm a software engineer and this is horrible.  I got an error at checkout saying it couldn‚Äôt process my credit card but the card shows the charge but I didn‚Äôt get tickets.   Tried to use PayPal for another concert and I couldn‚Äôt use it because I couldn‚Äôt see all of the fields to fill out to finish the transaction. The ticket insurance radio buttons and text are near impossible to read because of the poor UI.  Whoever approved this release needs a different job.
Title: Horrible

Content: I had selected reserve parking as part of my purchase and when I went to finalize my purchase the parking option completely disappeared.  When I restarted the purchase process, all of the parking options were greyed out.  Dollars to donuts that TicketMaster is going to jack up the parking prices in the coming weeks.  Let‚Äôs we how much the prices change from the screenshots I captured.    Pearl Jam was right, TicketMaster is purely a bad actor.   I hate having to fork over money to the TicketMaster monopoly.
Title: Bait and switch

Content: Ya‚Äôll are crooks and you can‚Äôt make a functioning app? Figures. Let me start by saying I despise Ticketmaster/Live Nation. But the cherry on top is the fact that I‚Äôm forced to use these apps and companies, yet they can‚Äôt even do their own job. Why do I have to delete the app, restart my phone, download the app again, and sign back in to get it to work? This seems like the most basic thing an app can do, and yet this app cannot even do that. If I could rate lower than 1 star, I 100% would.
Title: Non-Functioning App

Content: Tried multiple sites for tickets to Frozen on Broadway that were difficult to use and had very high fees added to ticket price. Ticket Master site is easy to navigate and reasonable fees! Very happy and my grandchildren will be excited  with Orchestra Center Stage seats!!! Use this site for Broadway shows...You‚Äôll be happy.
Title: Broadway Tickets

Content: The problem with the app is that it continues to access their website and the nicest thing you can say about the website is that it was built by a 10 year old. Find anything useful leads you in circles. The real problem is Ticketmaster itself. IF there are no glitches everything might work out. If there are any glitches at all, then the problems really start.  This experience has led me to either deal directly with the venue or if Ticketmaster is the only option, then I will do without.
Title: Really

Content: I work in the event  business and can tell from experience Ticketmaster is the best way to go. They guarantee your tickets. I've seen a lot of disappointed people that have used 3rd party vendors or sites and they were taken advantage of. I'll pay a little extra for my tickets to be safe and secure.
Title: TM best, safest way to go

Content: Reviewed my credit card statement from several months ago and it showed I had purchased Bruno Mars tickets. Since I have been a repeated identity theft victim I assumed my credit card was compromised & I cancelled it. Unfortunately it was a misprint for other tickets I had purchased and TM refuses to give me comparable tickets to replace them as when I cancelled the credit card as fraudulent it cancelled my actual Jason Aldean tickets. Am really surprised that a company liked TM wouldn‚Äôt understand that they should make good on something because of their screw up.
Title: Ticketmaster disaster

Content: I‚Äôm not sure if I just overlooked it or not but it wasn‚Äôt very easy to change ticket choices. After choosing a row, And moving to the next options, it showed me the seat #s however, I would‚Äôve like to see the seat numbers sooner, like when I was originally choosing the section. I unfortunately lost out on two better sections because I had to keep going back and forth.
Title: Choosing Tickets

Content: I can‚Äôt get past the introductory screens on my iPad. After picking favorites I‚Äôm stuck on a screen that says ‚Äúenable push notification for‚Ä¶‚Äù and gives me no options do anything.
Title: Stuck forever on ‚Äúenable push notifications‚Äù

Content: The system for this is very confusing and when I finally find the right place to push and it goes to order processing it says server busy try again. After a couple of try‚Äôs it zeros my balance. Had to conceal first try and do again with different seats. This time only took two retorts to get through. Frustrating for the normal person. I guess the scalpers have the system wired.
Title: Verified Ticket

Content: The app doesn‚Äôt work very well. I try to search and save favorite artists and venues and most of the time it doesn‚Äôt find them.... which makes it pointless to use the app because you‚Äôre not getting updates about the artists/venues you want to know about. There are other times I search an artist and it says no results or no tours at this time, when they are definitely touring... I get frustrated almost every time I try and use this app.
Title: Not accurate

Content: Lately whenever I attempt to purchase using the apt I‚Äôm unable to purchase it keeps saying we are unable to process your purchase. I‚Äôve been using this App for years. I‚Äôm trying to get Maxwell tickets in Detroit MI
Title: Unable to purchase tickets

Content: Today was the first time I‚Äôve used the app. The commutation about the event and pre-ordering tickets was very clear and very easy. I especially appreciated the tips about making sure my payment info was in early.
Title: This was my first time using the app

Content: Good evening. I am a blind consumer. I have been trying to use the app on my iPhone 12 pro running iOS 16.4.1 to set up an account. because I am visually impaired, I use the iOS voiceover screenreader to navigate apps. Unfortunately, your app is not accessible to someone using a screen reader. I am unable to set up an account. it would be wonderful if your app were accessible to disabled folks, such as myself. We, too, enjoy concerts, and sporting games.  Thank you.
Title: App is not accessible to blind consumers

Content: Ticketmaster is a monopoly that intentionally drives up demand it know it is physically unable to meet with its servers. Then it ‚Äúdynamically‚Äù raises prices live during a sale based on this artificially high demand. Furthermore it charges fees over $100 per ticket in spite of monumentally terrible service. I‚Äôd tell you to use another site for your ticket purchasing‚Ä¶but you can‚Äôt because Ticketmaster/Live Nation is a monopoly. Good luck buying tickets with this terrible app as the site crashes a million times.
Title: The worst platform!

Content: The last two venues I tried to purchase on my phone app wouldn‚Äôt go through. I keep getting error messages. I finally ordered on my PC. Ever since I upgraded to iPhone 11 I‚Äôve had nothing but problems. Maybe the app needs to be upgraded too.
Title: Constant error messages

Content: Ticketmaster/Live Nation is a monopoly as reflected in this terrible app.  The app is nearly useless, would not even list the event I already had TM tickets for.  Had to go online to their site for event to even be listed.  Then when I finally got to the sell page, the app could not add my credit card (something went wrong, please try again, times 10). Customer service?  None.  Just an FAQ. No chat, no email, no phone number.   Boycott this crap company.
Title: Terrible app, terrible service

Content: This app is horrendous. I bought two tickets and during that process I had to reset my password twice, contact customer service three times and still don‚Äôt know where my tickets are. The app has now logged me out and whenever I try to log in, it says ‚ÄúError: User Not Logged In‚Äù. Terrible app, you are much better off going to the venue‚Äôs website and buy tickets directly. I‚Äôve even found cheaper ticket prices this way.
Title: Not sure how to give 0 stars

Content: Huge disconnect between the account you create online and the app. Does not recognize the account login info for my profile, and won‚Äôt let me create a new account on the app. Endless loop of ‚Äúsomething went wrong‚Äù or ‚Äúnot a member? Sign up‚Äù and ‚Äúthis email is associated with an existing account‚Äù. After 4 emails with no response, and my event coming up in 2 days, it‚Äôd be nice if they actually provided service beyond taking your money for tickets to events.
Title: Wish I could Give It a Zero

Content: Got in waiting room at 9:00.  Got in queue and counted me down to 1 by 10:05.  Said it was my turn to pick seats and then kicked me out.  Kept sending verification codes and would put me back at 1 only to kick me back out.  After this happening a few times over and over it finally put me back in with 2,000+ ahead of me.  By the time it came my turn again there was only crappy upper deck seats available for Garth at Arrowhead.  Ticket master really screwed this up
Title: Ticketmaster is terrible

Content: After 15 years and thousands of dollars with an average of 5 concerts a year, I am no longer able to purchase tickets on Ticketmaster via web and app. They tried to reset my account and deleted my purchase history.  I‚Äôm very upset I was told I needed to use a desktop or my phone. No longer on my iPad. I purchased tickets two weeks ago on my iPad and now I get error messages and no longer able to VIP NATION OR TICKETMASTER. I guess I am no longer a customer.
Title: No longer able to purchase on Ticketmaster since downloading app

Content: You can get out to Check your calendar at any point of the purchase, otherwise you have to start all over again. This is very frustrating, I was using the app on my phone, first I exited out of the app to check my calendar when I got back to the app I had to start all over again, then I started all over again and I received a call then I lost everything I had to start all over again again. This shouldn‚Äôt happen.
Title: Starting all over again every time you exit out of the app

Content: Doesn‚Äôt work over WiFi. This has now happened twice and when I ask what‚Äôs wrong they always ask first what‚Äôs your IP address then answer these 8 stupid questions. I‚Äôve answered them once and now want me to answer again. I checked with my provider and they don‚Äôt have them blocked and can ping there service in 15 secs so it‚Äôs NOT my provider it‚Äôs the app but they don‚Äôt want to admit that they just throw blame at your WiFi service provider. I tried another WiFi with different provider and same result.......error.
Title: Junk App

Content: The site Is very easy to use, only downside is the high cost of processing fees is absolutely ridiculous $28 per ticket is out of control. Other than that it‚Äôs a good website to use although I don‚Äôt believe they have a lot of competition. Rock on
Title: Ticket master

Content: I couldn‚Äôt delete some of the seats without starting over and losing my spot in the pre-sale queue.  I couldn‚Äôt buy a parking ticket at the same time as buying my concert ticket.  It didn‚Äôt show me what seats I would have in the row. Seats in some sections appeared on my phone but did not appear on my laptop as available. When I switched back to the phone they were suddenly available again.  There‚Äôs probably other things that were frustrating that I can‚Äôt remember at the moment.
Title: Frustrating

Content: I tried to contact Ticketmaster several times my phone, by chat and by email. Took over 24 hours to get back to me on email. Chat function was down. The 800-number and another 800-number were useless. Very poor customer service when all I wanted was a couple of easy questions answered. You should be able to call and get a hold of a real person and it be a person in the United States of America.
Title: Poor customer service response

Content: I picked available 2 seats for Garth Brooks Denver June 8,2019 on the app at least 25 times and they were gone before I got some. It was frustrating. But I did get tickets after being in the queue behind 2000+ people. The tickets opened at 10 am MT and I got my seats at 11:05. They are in the 344 section in the corner end zone but Garth plays in the round so will be fine.
Title: Seats Evaporate when picking

Content: I logged on line to buy tickets and I would get all the way through to ‚Äúplace my order‚Äù. It would then come back with an error to enter payment details however it would not provide me a screen to do so.  I tried many times, each time having to get a lesser tickets because another fan already bought the ones in my cart.  Extremely frustrating as I downgraded 3 times - these were birthday/Christmas gifts. :(. Not a fan of the site
Title: Missed out on tickets due to glitch in the system

Content: Let me count the ways Ticketmaster is terrible. I won‚Äôt even name high, economically unsubstantiated fees in  this list: 1) You cannot select and deselect individual seats on an iPhone.  2) Verified Reseller tickets have a higher processing fees than Standard tickets. There‚Äôs no basis for this. 3) As a Verified Reseller, price changes can take hours to appear in the list of available seats.  4) As a Verified Reseller, tickets sometimes do not appear in the list of available seats at all. This recently happened to me. I was trying to adjust my reseller price change 3 hours before an event. My tickets disappeared completely from the list of available tickets.  5) Ticketmaster is sloppy. They even invented a word. When selling tickets: ‚ÄúWe include buyer‚Äôs fee and Ticketmaster commission up front so you can price competiticely!‚Äù What‚Äôs competiticely?!
Title: Ticketmaster is terrible

Content: Trying to buy tix for an event.  For several hours app told me no seats.  Web site said no seats.  The it started showing seats but I could buy them it told me to come back later.  Then it wouldn‚Äôt let me pick my seats but an hour later it allowed it.  The web site never worked.  It could be the event or it could be TM and not the app.  Very frustrating it should be easier like the rest of the web and apps.   TM and Verizon are the worst designed site and apps I have to deal with.
Title: App doesn‚Äôt work website doesn‚Äôt work

Content: I have an even tonight and I have digital tickets so I downloaded this app. Once downloaded it stating that it is an required update needed, yet when I go to my App Store and to my updates this app is nowhere to be found. Smh I hadn‚Äôt even had the chance to explore the app before the bug started please fix ASAP!! I need my tickets by 7pm tonight. I was in the phone(hold) with Ticketmaster for 18 minutes after having to search for a number that actually works smh. This makes me not want to deal with the headache ever again!!
Title: Not working

Content: I just feel like there has to be a way to make it easier for REAL people to get tickets to shows.  Literally tried for three days to get tickets to a show and cant even get through the queue.  Got kicked out each time bc of server errors. Then to log onto resale sites and the ticket are 4 times more expensive than the sold for within minutes of a presale is unacceptable. Make the tickets no transferable or something.

Content: The app won‚Äôt allow you to purchase different tickets for the same event. Example, if you want 2 tickets but one mezzanine and 1 GA you have to do two separate transactions. Also, I have an account with the app but I still have to type in name address, phone number, and all the credit card info for each ticket. There is no autofill credit card feature for an iphone. The app is useless and doesn‚Äôt save time or make it easier.
Title: App not good

Content: I am using an iPhone 12 Pro Max with IOS 15.6.1.  When I try to use the app I get a message saying the app thinks I am a bot.   There is no way I can get by that message.   When I try to get support, their process insists I am so stupid I just don‚Äôt know my password.  That is not the issue.   When I search for more support I end up in a loop of their FAQ page that only sends me to reset my password.   I cannot find any support other than the FAQ loop.  They do not care about clients.
Title: This app does not work.

Content: Ticketmaster bought StubHub, which I used for years with no problem. I have had nothing but problems with both Ticketmaster and the app.   When I bought tickets through StubHub, I was moved to the Ticketmaster app to download them. The tickets did not show up on the Ticketmaster app.   When you accept tickets via an email, you are sent to the Ticketmaster website and not the app. My password for the app does not work on the website, and there is no way to get the website password or change it.   There used to by a support line for StubHub, but there is no phone line or chat for Ticketmaster support. There is an email, and when I used that I got a reply five days later.   I paid $650 for a pair of tickets and paid $350 in Ticketmaster fees.
Title: No help line and 50% fees

Content: I had to authenticate myself over 20 times, and after getting into three queue, I was kicked out when I almost got in. I'm sure this is an issue within ticketmaster itself, because my friend had issues like this as well with the authentication. In the end everything got sold out and I had to buy resale tickets, all because it kicked me out the queue when I was almost in and because it kept having an error within authentication.
Title: Really bad

Content: Don‚Äôt buy here don‚Äôt sell anything here either. No customer support other than irrelevant canned replies from the faq section that don‚Äôt resolve any thing. When I bought my tickets someone in Columbia tried to charge the card I used several times. When I logged into the account last time someone in Virginia accessed my account. My bank flagged the charges. Everyone I have interacted with this company there is always some kind of hack that I‚Äôm guessing they try to pull.
Title: No no

Content: Tried checking out for tickets and it wouldn‚Äôt let me filter, wouldn‚Äôt let me change the amount I was willing to pay, wouldn‚Äôt let me search on the map for seats, finally got tickets selected went to checkout and clocked for 20 minutes said my tickets didn‚Äôt go thru so I purchased more tickets those went thru immediately and so did the first set so now I have 4 tickets to 1 show
Title: Numerous clutches

Content: My daughter requested to buy tickets, However it was pre sale, which I spent all day on web and phone. It was not until 8:00-9pm ish that I was able to order over phone. They were supposed to email me, I have NOTHING. I have requested ticket master to call me, and nothing. Horrible experience. They were rude to top it off, as if it was my issue!!! Did I mention that their web site was down?
Title: Awful experience

Content: My family and I have been loyal Ticketmaster customers for over 20 years now!  We have gained so many memories going to sporting events and concerts over the years and that to us is priceless!  Thank you Ticketmaster for always putting on a show!
Title: Loyal

Content: I cannot believe how bad this app is for iPad.  Utter garbage.  Ticketmaster is a dominant force in their industry.  You would think they would invest time and energy into making a user friendly app which expedites purchases from their company.  No, not Ticketmaster.  There is no excuse for the swill.  The website is not great, but at least I can eventually complete a purchase there, which I can‚Äôt do on the app.  It‚Äôs worse than useless; it‚Äôs aggravating.

Content: For the past two or three months, the app will kick me out of my account. When I go to log in, it says the server cannot be found. Too many times have I opened the app to wallet my tickets, and again, the server cannot be found when I try to log in. I have been looking for an update to fix this problem, one hasn't been released. This is such a huge inconvenience.

Content: The Ticketmaster app is one of the easiest, and most helpful to use! I really appreciate the quick-access links to get the details on various packages, and the list of add-ons offered so I don‚Äôt miss out! Plus, it‚Äôs a great Hype-man! It seems just as excited as I when those tickets are purchased!!!

Content: You pretty much have to use Ticketmaster in order to purchase tickets to any concert. They are the largest ticket sellers in the world, but can‚Äôt even make an app that works? I currently have tickets purchased for 3 separate events and when I go on the app to check dates/info/health info it gives me a ‚ÄúLogin error‚Äù so I can‚Äôt log in to see them unless I go to the website, what‚Äôs the point of the app then? Login error:invalid operation, UserManager not prepared for any login settings
Title: This app is crap

Content: I just changed my TicketMaster password 3 different times within 10 minutes. However, every time I want to sign into this app, it asks me to keep changing the password. That‚Äôs highly annoying. Your system could see that multiple password changes were successfully made and all passwords were completely different. I have to use the browser since this app won‚Äôt let me sign in. Please fix.
Title: Change of password error in app

Content: There has to be a better option then Take-it Master. I forgot why I avoided using this ticket service so vehemently until I placed a recent order for one, just one ticket. I was promptly reminded. You‚Äôd have thought I ordered two tickets plus fees!  This has to be usury of some sort. This is by far the largest set of fees I‚Äôve paid any entity ever in my life for a menial service. Please use anything other than these guys. They‚Äôre  extortionists.
Title: There has to be a better option then take it master

Content: Ticketmaster really preys on the fact that fans would pay above their budget to watch their favorite artists live. The fact that they do dynamic pricing to price gouge tickets they know are in high demand is cruel and unfair to both fans and artists a like. Recently among the pandemic, they are refusing to offer refunds, only allowing for the possibility of attending a rescheduled event or allowing a refund if the artist offers such. This company clearly does not have any sympathy or general regard for their customers. They continue to be a huge disappointment.
Title: Shady and money hungry business

Content: There is a bug with creating a new account I have tried 3 different emails checked them multiple times and it keeps telling me that the email I confirm is not the correct email  when It‚Äôs spelled exactly the same
Title: There is bug with creating a new account

Content: After being on hold for 45 minutes I was finally able to speak with someone that only asked for my order number to put me back on hold for another 25 minutes. After I finally spoke with someone, I immediately asked to speak with a manager. The manager seemed unsure about a lot of my questions and they also did not care one bit about me being on hold for so long. I will never buy from Ticketmaster again, they have the worst customer service thus far!!!
Title: Terrible Customer service

Content: Received this error 6 times, opened new window and it said I couldn‚Äôt buy because in different line. Closed all apps still got couldn‚Äôt buy because in different line. Closed everything, logged out and was finally able to buy to second show on Sunday. Much rather prefer Saturday but because of Ticketmaster technical issues...oh well
Title: Your place in Q no longer valid

Content: With the fees being charged you would think the process would be easy as point and click but no!  Couldn‚Äôt log in or get password changed in timely manner and missed opportunities!  It should not be this hard to spend my t!
Title: Hardest purchase ever

Content: I would get to the very last step of purchasing tickets and I would get a pop up that would be blank white. So, I didn‚Äôt know if an actual payment had gone through or if I had my tickets or not! I would look in my tickets and there wouldn‚Äôt be anything and every time I tried to purchase the same blank pop up would come up. I hope I won‚Äôt be charged multiple times as I couldn‚Äôt tell if my tickets were processed or not through a blank pop up!
Title: Purchasing the tickets

Content: I have tried multiple times to order tickets with an account on computer, I pad and I phone.  Finnaly downloaded App on Iphone.  When I tried to buy tickets, I was not able to purchase with Master Card.  I tried and tried.  Each time entering correct info.  I was timed out.  Then I used AE and still had trouble, but finally got ticket confirmation.  I have spent more than an hour trying to order!  Worse site that I have ever used!
Title: Poor Service

Content: I Had issues of not allowing me to update new card, address etc. Then I decided to scroll further down, and low and behold there was a delete card on file. Once I did that, just re-entered my info. So most times it‚Äôs usually a PEBKAC. (Problem exists between keyboard and chair)

Content: Purchasing tickets for events on Ticket Master‚Äôs is absolutely effortless. When selecting your seats there is a map of what is available, and you are assured that that will be your seat. I have been doing this for years purchasing online and have never had a problem.     Jo
Title: Ticket Easiest

Content: It took me 4 separate times to pay for these tickets. Then I needed to pay for them and I clicked the green tab that says ‚Äúpay‚Äù and it didn‚Äôt process. If there was a way to pay for these tickets another way, i would have done it
Title: Poor online process

Content: Thanks for having the lower fees compared to other sites. Would be nice if they were lower especially since the report regarding tickets beings sold to scalpers ahead of every day people. I remember standing 2nd in line at the start of out sales day. The lady in front of me bought her tickets right away and when she said next I asked for 3 steeler tickets and she said they were sold out less that 3 minutes of sales. Title: Ticket Fees

Content: Im surprised I even had the patience to stick through the frustrations. Sometimes it would freeze as soon as I selected the show. Other times, I got as far as entering my debit card number and then it would freeze. At one other point it wouldn‚Äôt let me edit the number of tickets from two to one. This was beyond buggy.
