Title: Over 50 minutes to purchase 1 concert ticket

Content: App spams you during the concert to alert you the concert has started (yes, I am aware as I was present...). Started two hours beforehand and notified me every 30 minutes for 3-4 hours. I couldn‚Äôt turn it off and I didn‚Äôt give TM permission to send me push notifications or geo-location. After turning off every iPhone setting I could find, still kept spamming me during the concert. Bad experience and once my next concert has started I‚Äôm deleting the app and will just print tickets from now on.
Title: Stop spamming during concert

Content: Ticketmaster fees are predatory and money grubbing. You offer absolutely no service besides being a middle man between myself and attendance at venues hosting incredible artists.  Ticketmaster should devise a business model that properly distributes ticket funds to the artists responsible for attracting audiences while simultaneously respecting their consumer base,  i.e the fans. There is absolutely no excuse for me having to pay the equivalent of an extra ticket in fees! The sooner you go out of business and/or your monopoly is broken up the better for Americans and music listeners around the world.
Title: Fees

Content: Honesty i had no hope for the ticketmaster app, but she pulled through. The app made it look like my tickets did not go through. Thankfully I checked my email the next morning and I did get tickets. Out of my 4 devices, only the app got tickets so i would recommend trying it.
Title: loveyougirlie

Content: I‚Äôve spent days now uninstalling and reinstalling this STUPID app on my phone and on my other electronics. When I go to check out, the page freezes and then it releases my tickets back into the public‚Äôs hands. I had the perfect tickets and they were gone because the app wouldn‚Äôt load my information to confirm the purchase. It is IRRITATING to try and buy tickets several times for shows and not be able to. FIX YOUR APP! Lord knows y‚Äôall charge enough in ‚Äúfees‚Äù to pay someone to be on top of this....
Title: Can‚Äôt buy tickets

Content: I love using this app. It‚Äôs so quick and easy to look at the map of the arena and pick the exact seats that you want.  Payment is a breeze and you can see your tickets immediately after payment if you select Mobile phone tickets.
Title: Quick and easy

Content: If you‚Äôre waiting for tickets to go on sale then after waiting for a few minutes you see ‚Äútickets sold out‚Äù‚Ä¶try again. I got back in and bought 2nd row seats. Keep trying!
Title: Tickets Sold Out

Content: ‚Ä¶so the app is pretty unusable. I get the message ‚ÄúLogin Error - The data couldn‚Äôt be read because it isn‚Äôt in the correct format‚Äù. Also the site is down a lot, they force password rotations, and you have to log in multiple times accessing different parts of the app/site. How is login not a priority? Simply accessing Ticketmaster is a nightmare the majority of the time, whether on web or iOS. Fix your cookies maybe? Attempt some modern web dev practices? lol
Title: Can‚Äôt log in

Content: There is no way to get support if you are having a problem with the tickets . It showed purchased for tickets but no tickets in my app and the only way to chat on the app is if you have tickets. Make that make sense! Insane
Title: Efficient app but worthless customer service

Content: This is a scam!   They allow all the tickets to be sold at the sale price.  For instance.  300 level $75.  Then u try and try and every time u lock on a std admission priced ticket u wait.  Then a pop up says sorry.  Someone else got those tickets.   This goes on for 1/2 hour until no gen admission are left and now u can only buy resale.  They immediately turn them into a resale ticket and u pay double for the same seat!   This is the biggest scam going!!  Disgusting!
Title: Complete rip off

Content: Not only are the fees ridiculous, and over the top. Trying to sell tickets that are not going to be used has been way to much work. I posted 2 tickets for sale a 2 months ago. 2 weeks ago they sold and now they‚Äôre having me verify a bunch of stuff before I get the money from it. Why do I have to verify now when it‚Äôs the same exact bank account I used to buy the tickets? They just don‚Äôt want you to bother so they can steal your money.
Title: A Hastle

Content: For as much money as Ticketmaster manages to steal from its customers, you would expect for them to have their stuff together while purchasing tickets. I entered the waiting room for a highly anticipated comedy show, and I had my tickets stolen from me 4 times. Ticketmaster: use the money you steal in ‚Äúconvenience fees‚Äù to upgrade your app and buy more servers so this stuff doesn‚Äôt happen. You are a disgrace to the human experience. Hope your monopoly is broken soon.
Title: Ticketmaster is the spawn of Satan

Content: Along with many issues I have had with Ticketmaster over decades trying to buy tickets for the show I was in the waiting queue then it went to sit tight for your tickets for five minutes then said it was sold out. I checked back in a half hour later and only nosebleed section seats are available. Ticketmaster is a monopoly and has hidden mechanisms in place that keep most people from being able to get tickets.
Title: Ticketmaster is the worst

Content: 1/2 the price of the ticket in service fees is ridiculous. This is such a racket I can‚Äôt even believe it is legal. Ticketmaster is one of the most hated companies because they constantly gouge event goers. It hate having to get tickets through this company and paying ridiculous amounts fir nothing at all. It is a forced fee. I hope someday it will stop but seems Ticketmaster has set the pace for this for years and no one will ever stop it. I suppose you know all this already.
Title: Fees are way too high.

Content: Thank you PayPal for offering payment options.  This has allowed me to purchase items.   Today I was blessed to receive a generous credit line and purchase best seat in house ticket to see someone special.  A great start for my upcoming birthday   Thank you!‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: Gratitude

Content: I‚Äôm only using Ticketmaster from this point on.! Have been using them for years and have never had any problems unlike other ticket agents. Quick, easy, accurate. My go to for quality assurance. Stovers
Title: Concert tickets

Content: First, I get kicked out of the app because they suddenly think I‚Äôm a bot. Read below:  ‚ÄúPardon the Interruption‚Äù   As you were browsing something about your browser made us think you were a bot. There are a few reasons this might happen:  You're a power user moving through this website with super-human speed. You've disabled JavaScript in your web browser A third-party browser plugin, such as Ghostery or NoScript is preventing JavaScript from running.  Then, I‚Äôm not allowed to sign in NOR change my password and I keep getting the following error message. Again, read below:  ‚ÄúWe Need to Try Your Request Again‚Äù  There was an unexpected error while processing your request. To continue, please try again.  How bout you fix this Ticketmaster!! ü§¨
Title: Pardon the Interruption?!?

Content: Terrible!  Will never sale or buy for them again.  I sold tickets to a concert and they never paid It out.  After several emails (because you cannot talk to someone over the phone) they claim It was refunded to the buyer.  I was not notified and on my app the tickets still state sold.  So either way I don‚Äôt get the money I sold and I wasn‚Äôt able to go to the concert.  Terrible customer service. Business lost forever from me.
Title: Will Not Pay Me For Concert Ticket Sale

Content: Ticketmaster declined my card. My bank said they reported it as fraud. They released my tickets and the event sold out in 15min. I was unable to secure tickets after they released them and declined my card. I was preverified and did everything they said to do to be ready when tickets were available to purchase. I even took off work to be ready, only to be declined by them..no way to contact customer service, not a good way to run a company.
Title: Ticketmaster, so disappointing

Content: Get a login error and can‚Äôt do anything else. Been this way at least a week. Not sure how long it really has since I haven‚Äôt had to log in for a while.   Oddly, logging in on Safari, then opening the app seemed to work today.   As usual, you get no response from Ticketmaster when trying to contact them about it. I‚Äôm not even sure they care what their app rating is because, well, it‚Äôs not like you have a choice where to buy tickets.
Title: Login Error

Content: I got timed out 3 times on my phone.  Then I tried on my laptop and it said I couldn‚Äôt use that device!  Then back to my phone - this time I chose to pay the ticket insurance and not take the Venmo option, and it finally let me buy the ticket.    With a time-sensitive purchase, on a public network, Ticketmaster won‚Äôt let me use Venmo even though they say it‚Äôs an option.  Because the insurance option isn‚Äôt available if you choose Venmo.    Ridiculous
Title: Ridiculous

Content: Terrible app that might as well not exist. My tickets never show up in the My Events section of the application but do show up without any problems on their website. Of course I thought maybe I was using two different accounts but verified it is the same account for both. If you can not even do the most basic task of keeping track of the tickets I already have, why would I use the application for anything else?
Title: Why bother using?

Content: Ticketmaster is easy to use, fast in getting my ticket. I used them in getting tickets to the Dallas Stars Cotton Bowl game also; got my ticket the day before the event when there were no supposed tickets to be bought. I would definitely recommend them to anyone needing tickets to any event.
Title: BTS Concert

Content: I had front row tickets on my iPad, but the app froze. I went to my laptop and secured different front row tickets but a message popped up that I needed to use a different devise. Really? A laptop won‚Äôt work? How lame is that? So I went back to my iPad and got third row seats. Thank goodness it didn‚Äôt freeze again or I would be extremely angry. This all took 20 minutes, and needless to say, I am very disappointed.
Title: Frustrating

Content: The app allows tickets that are no longer available to show up. On the third attempt to buy tickets I was finally did not get the ‚Äúsorry tickets sold while you were trying to buy them‚Äù. Additionally I had to wait in 45 minute queue to buy the tickets. And then I had to pay $96 per ticket in commissions. I went two stars since after one hour of time I was able to get tickets.
Title: False tickets keep showing up

Content: Tried selecting aisle seat for my son who has a bladder issue and requires using the restroom every hour or so, and they don‚Äôt even give you that as an option in your search.
Title: Very few choices for searching.  It doesn‚Äôt even give you an option for an aisle seat.

Content: Spent 10 minutes in the ‚Äúwaiting room‚Äù. Kept choosing tickets that were taken. When I finally got decent seats and put my credit card in to purchase and hit the buttons to pay and it said I exceeded the maximum, which was not true. By the time I finally got seats, I was in the back. Went from front rows in lower section to the back of the arena in the upper section because it kept telling me I was buying too many. Yet, I was within limits. Glad I paid $100 in fees for this nonsense.
Title: Exceeded maximum purchase????

Content: The available tickets do not get accurately displayed and the site does nothing to eliminate or discourage people who are essentially scalpers. Buyers should be verified! Entering my information to purchase tickets took multiple attempts on each required field. They also defaulted to storing my credit card information and do not have a multi-factor authentication process to actually protect this sensitive information. As one of the leading ticket sellers for entertainment, the combination of all these issues is unacceptable.
Title: Buggy and inaccurate

Content: Why is there not a cart?! I have to make two transactions to purchase four tickets to the circus. Because there were not enough seats available in that section I had to purchase two tickets, then go back in to purchase two more. There should be a way to add as many tickets as you require then checkout once. How difficult would this be to program? Oh, and the fees are rather ridiculous but what can you do..?
Title: Needs work

Content: After count them, 8 attempts to buy seats on the website and getting repeatedly kicked out ("it's not you it's us")in a moment of exasperation I thought to try the app. 2 minutes later the tickets were mine.
Title: Was easier than ordering on website

Content: Great app! Amazing booking experience... up until checkout. Nothing makes you second guess your purchase more than having to MANUALLY TYPE IN your credit card number. The autofill feature was surprisingly absent as well.  Please add Ô£øPay. That‚Äôs how the Starbucks app robbed me of 5% of my paycheck last year ‚Äî it was too darn easy to pay!
Title: Needs Ô£øPay

Content: I bought meet and greet tickets for Def Leppard and never received the t shirt or the pin. When I got to the show no one could tell me where the meet and greet was. I contacted Ticketmaster regarding this issue and received a message back that someone would call within 2 weeks and I never heard a word! Buyer beware
Title: Buyer Beware

Content: Great experience  User friendly but need more time to purchase and larger or different way to select seats. Circles are very small and wrong selections are made. Make it easier to delete and change selection  Thanks for rewards points with credit card
Title: More time

Content: Frustrating and angry describe my feelings dealing with you. After a half hour of repeated ‚Äúsorry tickets are unavailable ‚Äú, I finally magically found some but options for getting them were limited to mobile, or expensive home delivery.   What happened to print at home?  I‚Äôm unsure where they will appear and how I will find out. I‚Äôm using an iPad, not my cell phone, do you my number?       I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôm not your only customer that is not computer savvy.
Title: How could an oldies show sell out as soon as tickets go on sale?

Content: I would give it five stars but I am having problems with this app purchased ticket and I don‚Äôt understand why it says voided When is shouldn‚Äôt be voided because I purchased it! I‚Äôm always having this problem! Why hasn‚Äôt it updated for August 17 the last update was August 14 and is telling me voided! I‚Äôm not purchasing new ticket!
Title: I would give it five stars but...

Content: I‚Äôve had other sites cancel my orders multiple times in a row. Here, it‚Äôs always worked first time with no problems! The app makes getting to see all the thing a I want to see so much easier than anything else I‚Äôve tried. I love this!
Title: Never use another ticket site

Content: I‚Äôll just say this digital ticketing is for the birds. Not everyone has a smart phone or the savvy to deal with this digital. Not to mention that the app routinely doesn‚Äôt work properly. Please bring back paper tickets.
Title: Bring back paper tickets

Content: I bought tickets for Jack O Lantern for 10/28.  I meant to buy for the 21st.  My mistake.  I tried to change but didn‚Äôt have the right time for us on the 21st. However, on the 23rd the time was available.  I was not able to change because the tickets were cheaper on the 23rd. Along with that I was going to have to pay a $10 per ticket change fee that I was ok with.  I‚Äôm buying tickets for the 23rd and will just eat the cost for the 28th.
Title: Customer Service

Content: I understand the need for security, but I have the time when I log into this app and try to buy tickets. It tells me that I can‚Äôt buy tickets because he thinks I‚Äôm a bot. Flying through the website too fast because I‚Äôm a guy and I know what I want, causes this response.  My only other complaint is the amount of scalpers on here. Scalping is a legal hello!
Title: I am not a bot !!

Content: The entire user experience for the app is horrendous. I was trying to book a show, and the app kept assuming I was a bit somehow. I kept running into other issues, like the app not able to show tickets I purchased until after I killed the app completely and relaunched it. Logging out and then back in didn‚Äôt even fix that. Overall I wish the show provided an alternate ticket vendor instead of this lousy app and insufferable company.
Title: Terrible UX

Content: There is not a single cell in my body that believes the five star reviews on this app were made by actual human customers. Ask anyone who‚Äôs worked with Ticketmaster and they‚Äôll tell you what a predatory and insufferable company they are. Can‚Äôt wait for the day their monopoly breaks apart. As soon as other options are available, I‚Äôm certain no one will ever choose to work with them again, and the entire world of artists will be immeasurably better for it.
Title: One of the worst

Content: Ticket Master, your contact link never leads to an actual way to contact you. Is this why I paid $50 on top of the $200 ticket price advertised on your site?? For me to have no way to reach you to ask why the tickets didn‚Äôt show up in my account??? Do you actually have customer service? Your contact us page is a loop back onto itself. Your 25% fee should come with something resembling an actual service.
Title: Unreliable and no way to contact

Content: Although I successfully purchased my tickets the App did not work with PayPal. I have paid with PayPal before but for some reason today it would not go through. I missed out on the seats that I originally selected but I was lucky to find the same seats two rows back. This wasn‚Äôt an ideal experience but I‚Äôm still happy overall.
Title: App Did Not Work With PayPal

Content: Whenever I secure a ticket and go to pay for a ticket that it‚Äôs high demanded, an unexpected error occurs for some x reason. I am tired of this always happening, there‚Äôs a reason why it is high demanded and I am trying to buy it. I secured it and I am ready to pay, whenever I hit the ‚Äúplace order‚Äù, an error message appears. Happens multiple times, app needs to figure out how to fix that.
Title: Problem occurs often

Content: So I bought four tickets to a musical. Turns out I can‚Äôt go so they told me to follow these instructions in order to get a refund. I followed the instructions perfectly. They then tell me I cannot get a refund even though I followed the instructions. So now I have wasted $400 and cannot go to the show when I followed the rules. It has been over a week and no one has gotten back to me still and they don‚Äôt have a phone number to call anybody.
Title: Don‚Äôt buy from them

Content: They should not charge money to mail you the tickets when you‚Äôre already paying an expensive ticket fee. Also, the ticket fee is too expensive. These two issues are very disappointing.
Title: Very disappointed.

Content: Installed app on IOS for IPad. Kept showing me a page encouraging me to opt in for push notifications. The page though didn‚Äôt actually give me a way to enable, or not enable notifications. And it wouldn‚Äôt let me move on to see or do anything unless I chose an option to enable it without it actually allowing me a way to do so. Regardless of how many times I restarted the app it kept forcing me back to a page that didn‚Äôt allow me to move on.
Title: Needs work

Content: Ticketmaster is ridiculously difficult to access tickets that have been purchased I get notification 2 days before concert my tickets are ready to be accepted. I still haven‚Äôt figured out how to actually get these tickets . They can‚Äôt be reached by phone not accepting calls so you have to email your problem then I get instructions I don‚Äôt understand. They better let me into this concert on the 30th.  Will NEVER use Ticketmaster again.
Title: Unhappy customer

Content: With Ticketmaster, customer service is nonexistent. If you call the phone number there is an automated speech that disconnects the call after the speech is over.  If you email, you will receive an automated response from a bot from a ‚ÄúDo Not Reply‚Äù email.  The chat option has disappeared from my account.  If you need help with absolutely anything, Ticketmaster prevents you from getting help. Don‚Äôt work with them because they will NOT work with you.
Title: You CANNOT speak to a human

Content: Very bad experience so far dealing with Ticketmaster. I can‚Äôt use a credit (my own money).  I tried to use for upcoming events and it won‚Äôt let me. Almost impossible to get in contact with them and when I finally did after a half hour hold I got the run around. Finally they were going to email me a list of what I could use the credit for and I never received the email. Back to square one! Total hassle!!
Title: Ticketmaster credit/customer service

Content: Ticketmaster kept denying my request for these available tickets with a message to call my financial institution. I called them, and they said the transaction was being sent back as denied by Ticketmaster. When I (finally) got through to a customer service representative, he was pleasant, but said I‚Äôd have to be transferred to the resale department. After a lengthy wait again, I was told I should clear my search history. When I informed the rep I was using the app, he told me the same response.
Title: Certified Resale Tickets Order Does Not Work

Content: I have Klarna and would have liked to pay for the tickets over time, but there‚Äôs no way to do this even though that‚Äôs where I applied for, was approved for, and used Klarna for the first time.  Keeps pushing me to live nation where I can‚Äôt use Klarna.  On TM‚Äôs site, it offers flex pay, but there‚Äôs no application for that particular payment method, and no way to use it.  Ended up using my CC which I didn‚Äôt want to do.  Frustrated as all get out.... Contemplating not buying tickets through you, even if they are marked up..
Title: Payment

Content: The browser version and app version made me miss out on the seats that I wanted to get because the app kept crashing when I try to put in credit card info. Ticketmaster is the worst large ticket company to work with because they monopolize the market and charge such ridiculously high fees. I was struggling to purchase tickets for over an hour with the app and it still never worked. I had to have my friend go onto a computer to purchase our tickets.
Title: Buggy and not user friendly

Content: It‚Äôs become customary lately to use your Mobile App to scan your Event tickets. I am more comfortable having a printed paper ticket, in the event of technical issues with my cellphone. I wish ALL the venues would allow TicketMaster to continue to let customers print out their tickets...call me ‚ÄúOld School‚Äù...I like the paper trail (and memorabilia).
Title: Printable Tickets Preferred

Content: The instructions were easy to understand, very thorough, and I only had one glitch, web said sold out, then I clicked again, and then all the tickets are available to see.
Title: Great experience

Content: I tried numerous times to purchase tickets to a concert electronically and it wouldn‚Äôt work. Each time the message said use another device. After switching devices 3 times it finally worked. In the interim I tried calling customer support and the message indicated they were experiencing high call volumes and disconnected the call. I had a similar experience a few months ago when purchasing tickets for another event and thought it was an anomaly. Will consider other options.
Title: Ticketmaster Support

Content: I went through the ‚Äòhelp‚Äô section several times to try to find a solution for missing tickets (mailing address incorrect) and ended up in a never ending loop trying to access the live chat feature. Basically there was no option for chat when I selected ‚Äòorder details‚Äô next to my tickets like the ‚Äòhelp‚Äô service instructed. I eventually just gave up and REPURCHASED the same tickets I‚Äôve already paid for once.
Title: Missing tickets

Content: For a company the size of TM I expect more. I had to sign in before getting to my cart. I forgot my pw so I had to reset it which then made me release my tickets. So I lost the tickets I wanted. Then the checkout process doesn‚Äôt allow auto fill. The city and state has to be filled in which I would expect entering an address in this day in age would auto populate. Long story short I lost the tickets I wanted four times and ended up with really bad seats because of the awful UX of the Ticketmaster app.
Title: Poor UX. I probably won‚Äôt use again.

Content: Planning to get tickets for a surprise gift, the website will not work, citing software/hardware conflicts.  I installed the iPhone app before reading reviews, never again.  There appears to be too much risk of exorbitant fees and even purchasing resell tickets. It looks like boys get tickets immediately and can resell through Ticketmaster. Because that is wrong on so many facets, I shall go back to avoiding anything to do with Ticketmaster. I‚Äôll try other venues or just disappoint people about tickets. Money is better spent on worthwhile ventures.
Title: Disappointed

Content: I can‚Äôt believe Ticketmaster would create an app that wouldn‚Äôt connect me to buying a ticket during presale.  I was buying tickets to go see Twenty One Pilots with my daughter.  She‚Äôs an obsessed fan.  40 minutes later my daughter told me her friends all used a computer to get the tickets.  I now had to login to a computer and get upper deck seats.  I‚Äôm beyond angry and disappointed.  I wish I had known this app wouldnt work.  Now my daughter has to pay for it with a broken heart.  I feel like I failed her.  Thank you so much!!
Title: Horrible App!!!

Content: I made the mistake of trusting the app to try and grab tickets for the Lana show. I was up since 7 AM constantly refreshing the app for tickets that released at 10. I sat there for the countdown and everything and soon as the tickets released tickmaster took 5 mins to even load the page up and I wasn‚Äôt responsive until I logged out and back in, by that time there were 2000+ people in front of me and the show was sold out. I‚Äôm so upset.
Title: AWFUL! PLEASE JUST USE IT ON THE COMPUTER

Content: It‚Äôs ridiculous that companies and artists let Ticketmaster and others sites allow scalpers to buy and resell at ridiculously inflated prices. There‚Äôs also zero reason as to why hard working fans who save their money, need to pay an additional service fee and venue fee when buying tickets online. Disgusting practices to the point where I would be ashamed to be an employee for Ticketmaster or an artist that allows them to be used for concert sales
Title: Garbage Monopoly

Content: Tried to place order on my computer. I‚Äôd click on the seats hit place order and it would time me out in a matter of seconds . Made multiple attempts and at one point I timed it and it timed me out within 22 seconds . Tried on my phone and it won‚Äôt process my credit. I have zero problems with it anywhere but here at Ticketmaster. With all the money you charge for service fees I would expect better service! Max123
Title: Your system is failing !

Content: How could they have effed up the Taylor Swift pre-sale so badly. Really disappointed that I wasn‚Äôt able to get tickets after waiting in a queue all day. I spent an hour selecting tickets and getting error after error when hitting next to purchase them. I had the fan boost from Taylor Nation too. This sale was handled beyond poorly. They knew and understood the turnout would be high. The knew how many verified fan codes they sent out. How did this go so wrong?
Title: The worst experience

Content: The system is awful, it took me six transactions and multiple calls to my credit card company to finally obtain tickets‚Ä¶. Constantly receiving an error message of ‚Äúoops something went wrong‚Äù‚Ä¶ all of my credit cards were charged but, no tickets were received.. I was bogged down in the app till all the tickets I wanted were purchased. While having to call my credit card company to make sure I wasn‚Äôt charged.
Title: Event Tickets

Content: TicketMaster has mastered the art of selling you tickets. I have been going through Ticketmaster for years and will continue too. There are so many options to choose for your venues. So forget about the rest because TM is the best.
Title: Mastered

Content: Bought some $30 tickets before they ‚Äúsold out‚Äù, then found out the rest were being held back and sold later at $90. Ticketmaster claimed they were selling them at ‚Äúfair market value‚Äù‚Ä¶ as in whatever the company thinks they can get it at. I laughed  when I saw them drop back down to $30 closer to the performance date.  The company is manipulating ticket prices, and I‚Äôm not going to support them or any bands that go through them.
Title: Manipulating Ticket Prices

Content: It‚Äôs not hard to copy and paste, which is what should‚Äôve been done when describing the amenities for the folks sitting in the club mezzanine section for the Jerry Seinfeld 21:30 show on Jan 6, 2023 in Deerfield Beach, Fl.   It‚Äôs not listed in the caption like it is for the first show. Just wanna make sure I‚Äôm getting my monies worth, and that we can plan our evening accordingly.   I lost an booking spot, because this information was not there.
Title: More information

Content: While on the credit card pay screen, I left app to get credit card number from my secure password app, when returning to the Ticketmaster app, the page refreshes and wipes out all previously entered information. Other than that, app works great.
Title: Suggestion

Content: Anytime I need to work through something on Ticketmaster I‚Äôm constantly switching between the app and the browser. My app either crashes or shows pop up errors when I deal with payment and the site is clunky. Would love to just pick one thing and stick with it but I have to go back and forth.
Title: Inconsistent

Content: I ordered tickets and it says it sent. I put in all my information right and I still haven‚Äôt gotten the email or anything saying where my tickets are so I try to buy more but then those don‚Äôt show up and the show is tomorrow so I don‚Äôt know what is going on. When I ask them for help they didn‚Äôt really help me they didn‚Äôt get back to me and I still didn‚Äôt get my money back for the tickets I bought last month for tomorrow.
Title: Lost a lot of money

Content: Logged me out of my account for reselling my tickets on 2 different occasions never got my money when the first one sold with absolutely 0 response on what to do recently sold another ticket to be told they need me tax payout for absurd reason to pay me my money sold from the ticket and was not notified till a month after the ticket sold and was again logged out of my account and can no longer log back in but they continue to send me emails. DONT TRUST WITH YOUR MONEY!!!
Title: Horrible.

Content: TM is already charging ridiculous fees to access someone else‚Äôs products, they could exercise a little restraint in all the add-ons, special offers and partner promos. It takes about 30 seconds to find a show and purchase tickets, and several minutes to wade through all the extra crap, decline insurance and click through the marketing popups to get an order confirmation.
Title: To much advertising

Content: I have the app and agreed to receive text notifications from Ticketmaster. That sounds great except now I don‚Äôt receive text notifications or email notifications. I have to email customer service several times before they actually read my email correctly and actually answer my questions. Please solve this glitch in your notifications, having to contact you repeatedly has gotten old.
Title: Communication glitch

Content: A friend and I signed in for the waiting list at almost the same time.  I was entered into the waiting room 1 min prior to my friend.  However, he was able to buy tickets at least 20 minutes before I was able to get tickets.  When I tried to buy tickets, I got multiple error messages.  I was on my app, he was on his lap top.  If there is a significant advantage of being on a lap top, I would have liked to have been notified.
Title: How did this happen?

Content: I tried to purchase tickets for an Arizona Diamondbacks baseball game both on my laptop and on the mobile app on my iPhone and I was told on both devices then the transaction cannot be processed in I had to use a different device. I eventually was able to make the purchase on my old iPad. It took me over an hour to complete this transaction because of all the difficulties trying to use the Ticketmaster website and application.
Title: Unreliable application

Content: Constantly errors on page when tickets go on sale. Then they say there are tickets available until you click on them they are gone. Now they want to go only mobile tickets. Gonna be a train wreck
Title: Tickets sales

Content: What if I know what show I want and where it is? How about giving me a choice to just say that instead of taking me on a trip that‚Äôs not even my location! It took three tries to even put the correct date in with no typos. It took an hour between getting kicked out in my laptop to giving up the ghost and using your app. At least the app didn‚Äôt kick you out while trying to get the credit card out of my wallet. Thanks.
Title: Get a clue

Content: I had to call customer service, I was on hold for 40 minutes to get absolutely no help. Don‚Äôt worry though- I figured it all out myself! If I didn‚Äôt have a gift card to use with ticket master I would have ordered my tickets else where.
Title: Terrible customer service

Content: I tried logging into the app and it told me my information was wrong. After several attempts I changed my password and got the same result. I was able to log in on the website without issue. I emailed Ticketmaster and their solution was to delete and reinstall the app and remind me I can ‚Äúalways use the website‚Äù. After re-installing I have the same issue. Clearly Ticketmaster isn‚Äôt worried about the app not working since I was reminded I can use the website. So I deleted it completely.
Title: Useless

Content: Ready to pick my tickets the system kicked me out had to start over first time it was only 20 minutes then it took over a half hour total of an hour to get tickets to long .

For a local concert we almost booked, the app was going to charge us over $70 in ‚Äúconvenience fees‚Äù. We cancelled and instead spent 30 extra minutes and spent $5 in gas‚Äôs to drive to the box office instead.

You can‚Äôt screen shot what was emailed to you; you have to have the app. The TSA at the airport will allow me to use screen shots of my boarding pass to scan, but you require an app for ‚Äúaccount security‚Äù? You need things to be more secure than at the airport?  No, you want to track people‚Äôs data and market to them and force their consent my forcing use of the app. üëé

It worked in the 80‚Äôs, 90‚Äôs, & 00‚Äôs with few issues. Just a suggestion.

Why is all of that necessary? Just to make money off us twice over? Once on pricey concert tickets, another time on data you can sell to advertisers? I think this very well might be a dealbreaker for me.  Make your tickets more easily accessible. Make it easier (or possible at all?) to add them to Apple Wallet. Stop flexing your corporate muscles and try to return to a user-friendly experience.  This isn‚Äôt what concerts are meant to be like.

Content: I already have a Klarna account. When I went to check out I assumed it would come out of the Klarna account that I already have. It asked for my social security number and I thought it verifying my account. It didn‚Äôt!!!  I take responsibility in I should have read more.   Thank you
Title: Klarna

Content: This a terrible app. Ticketmaster has allowed scalpers to completely take over the ticket buying process and just ruined the concert going experience for everybody. They get rich but nobody gets to enjoy the music because scalpers resell all the tickets for exorbitant prices. If I were a music artist, I would never use platforms like Ticketmaster to promote my concerts. Greed has always ruined art. Just the basest of Caveman behavior , stay away from it
Title: Scalpers have taken over Ticketmaster

Content: Trying to purchase a simple drake ticket but I‚Äôm constantly being hit with errors and being told to ‚Äúmake sure you are logged into the app‚Äù while I‚Äôm logged in. Trying again over and over and over again, manually, until Ticketmaster considers me a bot. How am i a bot while using the app? Unbelievable. No customer service available and no work around. Just a terrible product.
Title: Poor app and even worse website.

Content: The app itself is amazing the API the interface very easy to use very intuitive not hard at all. However I do have a problem with Ticketmaster charging outlandish fees for something that is done automatically on us back in the server. And it‚Äôs not like you can get it from anywhere else so they almost have a monopoly on this type of service
Title: No offense to the app itself

Content: Worked fine on iphone. For iPad, the window is stuck on a page where I have to agree to punch notifications. It may progress to the rest of the features after that. Since I did not want push notifications, I will never know. This is a necessary evil if I want to attend events, but I would love to give a competitor a chance if there comes to be one.
Title: Does not work on iPad

Content: I can't get access to the app anymore. I'm getting an error message, Pardon the Interruption. As you were browsing something about your browser made us think you were a bot. There are a few reasons this might happen. You're a power user moving through this website with super-human speed. You've disabled JavaScript in your web browser. A third-party browser plugin, such as Ghostery or NoScript is preventing JavaScript from running.
Title: Ticket master app

Content: I just got tickets for an event that has two tiers of tickets: 17 and under and 18 and over. To buy one for my daughter and two for my wife and I, the app/website required two full checkouts. What application does that? One from 1995? Come on Ticketmaster, create a shopping cart so your customers only have to do a single checkout.
Title: Can't put multiple types of tickets in your shopping cart

Content: I went on this app to purchase tickets for an upcoming concert. There were not good options for anything and the ticket prices kept fluctuating. At one point tickets were over $300 for seats furthest from the stage. When I did try to buy tickets it would not let me. Trying to buy extremely overpriced tickets and not even being able to do that was absurd. I will not use this app again.
Title: Very frustrating and expensive

Content: Every experience I‚Äôve had on Ticketmaster has been awful, the site crashes, the waitlist doesn‚Äôt work in favor of the fans, Ticketmaster increases the price of tickets because they are ‚Äúin demand‚Äù. It‚Äôs horrible and needs to be put in check because for a lot of people Ticketmaster is the only viable option to get tickets and it‚Äôs become more frustrating and less consumer friendly over time.
Title: How Does Ticketmaster Have a 4.8

Content: Ticketmaster, please fix this.  Why can‚Äôt I share NFC-based tickets from my Apple Wallet?  This makes it extremely inconvenient when someone is late to an event.  Contrary to what your expecting, not everyone wants/has a Ticketmaster account nor wants to install your app on their phone.  It‚Äôs 2022, there‚Äôs a way to share and still avoid ticket fraud, it just seems you want another way to data mine other folks.  Fix this!!
Title: Can‚Äôt share NFC tickets from Apple Wallet!!

Content: No info or tickets cost, they just need you to create an account to collect your info without providing any info for marketing reason. Not recommended  They took advantage that they only way to watch your favorite artist is yo buy through them.  I love watching my artists specially that it happens in my city, but will not let this go along. Master tickets lose, my artist lose & I win Let us buy a ticket without saving our info.
Title: No info are provided

Content: I looked at numerous sites for tickets to a game and could not believe the difference in prices from site to site.  Ticketmaster had much better prices and their fees were better as well.  We saved 100s!
Title: Best selection and prices

Content: Easy and simple way to buy ticket. I‚Äôve been buying ticket from Ticketmaster and so far I have no problems. I recommend it to all my friends and family. And by using Paypall it makes transactions with Ticketmaster a lot safer.
Title: Joe Bonamassa

Content: Ordering tickets to see my favorite concert or show is quick and easy with Ticketmaster! I feel confident ordering with the ease of the website. Your information is stored for quick and easy check out!
Title: SEEING STARS!

Content: Selected tickets, tried to check out, not in basket.  Several times.  Each time I went back to get the same seats, they were gone - not because someone bought them, but because they were being held by my account!  How do I know?  The seats reappeared an hour later.  Frustrating, especially when they are charging a $20 service fee per ticket!  Talk about feeling used and abused!
Title: Lost state of transaction multiple times

Content: Do NOT buy tickets through Ticket Master! They are a complete scam. If you don‚Äôt believe me, just try calling their 1-800 number, you have no option to talk to anyone and you are suppose to send an email which you will get no response for weeks, then you will get some generic response. They sell Tickets from third parties, and take ZERO responsibility for anything that has gone wrong. Always buy straight from the venue, NEVER buy from these scam artists!
Title: Total Scam!

Content: App experience on the last page (payment) was not good ! The controls kept scrolling to the top lf the screen after I entered or cleared any information in any of the fields ! It was little annoying to scroll back to where I was making the edits !

Content: Trying to buy tickets for a week. The website did not allow me to purchase tickets on any of my devices and there is no customer service available at all. The phone number is a recording with no options to speak to anyone and email is only provided when you already purchase tickets. üôÑ
Title: Poor customer service

Content: Their app is spotty, glitchy. NOT what you want when you‚Äôre trying to get tickets to a huge concert. Followed all their instructions for pre-sale, sat in line for 10 minutes and when it notified me I was next in line, it refreshed and said all tickets sold out. I forced closed the app and re-entered the line, what do you know? Number 472 in the queue. Now I‚Äôm in the nosebleeds for a concert I‚Äôve been wanting to attend for 3yrs. Stick with getting your tickets elsewhere. Or use the full website, NEVER the app.
Title: Unreliable

Content: For some reason, every so often (not all that infrequently) the app wants me to sign in using my password.  WHY???  If this ever happens when I‚Äôm at an event and wanting to use the onscreen ticket in the app to get in, I‚Äôll be screwed.  So I‚Äôm always sure to open the app before I leave home, so I can look up the password if I need to.  Other apps don‚Äôt do this.  Why do you?
Title: It keeps asking me to sign in!!

Content: The app is easy to use but I don‚Äôt like that when I choose seats it won‚Äôt let me proceed if I‚Äôve left an empty seat between filled seats. It gives an error message telling me to leave at least 2 seats empty, which shouldn‚Äôt be a requirement of me when purchasing my own tickets.
Title: Doesn‚Äôt let you leave an empty seat

Content: Horrible service.  I was unable to purchase tickets on my laptop. Received this message multiple times : ‚ÄùSorry but you are unable to purchase tickets on this device. Use a phone or laptop or tablet. Make sure you are signed in to Ticketmaster.‚Äù  But I was using my laptop and I was signed in! Then when I tried to purchase the tickets on my phone I got a message that said ‚Äúyou can‚Äôt purchase tickets because you are in the queue on another device.‚Äù  This is absolutely ridiculous and the representative could not help.  I finally was able to log out and purchase tickets on my phone but it was a huge hassle, waste of time and I lost tickets I wanted.  I want a partial credit to my credit card for the inconvenience.   Sincerely, erica sigmon
Title: Terrible service- vey dissatisfied

Content: Has the usual bugs I‚Äôd like to be fixed more often. In the middle of almost purchasing tickets, I was kicked out and got a pop up notification saying ‚Äúoops our bad‚Äù and than to try again later. 30 min later here I am.
Title: Love the app but

Content: Navigating the app is great however, the timer is too fast! I have to rush to put all my info and it really doesn‚Äôt give me too much time to double check I have that correct info. Please slow down the timer. I‚Äôm not as fast as I used to be :)
Title: Too fast

Content: Selected the tickets on row A that I wanted, got a pop up screen that said ‚Äúsorry another fan beat you to these tickets‚Äù and then gave me a choice to purchase tickets in row B.  I clicked on ‚Äúbuy row B tickets‚Äù and got a message ‚Äúsorry another fan beat you to these tickets‚Äù and gave me a choice to ‚Äúbuy row A tickets‚Äù!!!!!  This was very frustrating!!!!  Kept clicking on every ticket that was seemingly available after about 20 tries finally found a set of tickets that I could purchase.
Title: Bad experience

Content: Bought my tickets via app last time I got my tickets for BTS and it went smoother than using the website especially with the high traffic it had. Only con I didn‚Äôt like about it was that the app was minimalized that it missed showing some data that would‚Äôve been important

Content: I have purchased tickets for dozens of events and concerts through Ticketmaster and until today it was an easy, pleasant experience. I had to grab my phone and go through the entire process again. I did get tickets but they are not nearly as good as they should have been.
Title: Frustrated

Content: Ticketmaster charges way too much for their fees. The last several times I‚Äôve attempted to purchase tickets, Ticketmaster‚Äôs fees have been 50% of the ticket price.   The system doesn‚Äôt make sense either. Fees for more expensive tickets/seats are more money than cheaper seats. How are the fees different prices? Why not charge a single rate fee? I refuse to pay a $20 fee for one $40 ticket plus a processing fee for EACH ticket.   I will spend my money on local events and smaller ticketing platforms instead.
Title: Won‚Äôt use service

Content: Ticketmaster has always been a good option for me from buying last minute Mariners tickets to Hamilton tickets and everything in between. The app is very easy to use and I like the option of mobile tickets to add to the apple wallet.

So many bugs like scrolling down to load more, if you go up and come back again, you can‚Äôt see bottom ones. 4.5 star is probably fake reviews probably.

Content: App makes purchasing tickets for events quick and easy.  Being able to add tickets to your Apple wallet makes getting into venues quick and efficient.

I even deselected the ‚Äúreceive notifications‚Äù button and it still sent me three notifications back to back to back.
Title: STOP SPAMMING ME WITH NOTIFICATIONS

Content: Bought a ticket for a concert in April 2023, sold it back on the platform and it tells me to verify my bank account by depositing money onto their platform two separate times. I‚Äôve tried many times and everytime it says ‚Äúdeposits are invalid‚Äù. Content: Signed up for the presale for Luke Combs tickets, waited for the presale for start and I watched the count down for 45 minutes to make sure I was there and ready. This happened for each seat I clicked. My fianc√© and I were so excited to finally see Luke combs but ticket master ruined that.
Title: Horrible

Content: So hard to get tickets. Site crashes, takes so long to load, and shows tickets no longer available. Everything takes so long to load and just isn‚Äôt accurate. Heartbreaking to get into the queue with a low number and still be unable to actually acquire tickets. So sad to punish the fans with a million dollars in fees and a site that doesn‚Äôt work just so they can see their favorite artists.
Title: Terrible

Content: I was in queue to purchase tickets to a show. I got in, chose my tickets, then the app decided I was a bot and kicked me out. I‚Äôm not a bot, obviously. I didn‚Äôt even know there were apps to circumnavigate Ticketmaster until THEY told me about it.   I know it‚Äôs Ticketmaster buying their own tickets and selling them at a markup on a resale site they own. They think we‚Äôre stupid. Why can‚Äôt you regulate the US like other countries!?! So annoying.
Title: Site Needs Better Protection from Real Bots

Content: I‚Äôm using the Ticketmaster app and it says ‚Äú Pardon the Interruption As you were browsing something about your browser made us think you were a bot. There are a few reasons this might happen: You're a power user moving through this website with super-human speed. You've disabled JavaScript in your web browser A third-party browser plugin, such as Ghostery or NoScript is preventing JavaScript from running‚Äù

Content: Attempted to buy tickets for my mother who requires aisle seating due to her disability , and a companion seating for my sister to go with her. If I could give this 0 stars I would, because it does not work. Needs to be fixed.

Content: Truly the worst experience.  Ticket appears on the website when I log on, but not in the app when I log in with the same account. The app has no options to contact anyone by phone or email or text or chat.  So basically no customer service.   Went through every FAQ, no help. Eventually located the web contact form.   They sent an automated reply that they would get back to me in 24-48 hours.  But the event is tonight‚Ä¶ What am I supposed to do?    This is a company that has a monopoly and acts accordingly.  I wish I could give zero stars.  Absolutely worthless.  I wish I could boycott them but of course, they have a monopoly so we have no choice.  And they know it.  Absolutely pathetic.
Title: Doesn‚Äôt work and has zero customer service support

Content: Calling All attorneys a class action suit is needed! The NFL makes it hard and nearly impossible to sell tickets on other sites and I‚Äôm gettin ripped off! This year you must all give ticket master tax info to get paid, this has been done but Ticket master updated it and the intake form will not allow you to update the new missing information. This is another way for Ticket Master to hold on to your money longer! Alternatives needed!!!!!

All I wanted was tickets and Ticketmaster generated enough revenue from this transaction. It took me more time to click through all the promotions than it did to write this review.
Title: All I wanted was tickets‚Ä¶.

Content: This is by far the worst app I‚Äôve ever had to get tickets to any event. I‚Äôm convinced at this point that ‚ÄúTicketmaster‚Äù is a scam!  I ordered 4 tickets to an event that I never received. I tried in the days prior to the event to get my tickets figured out and was told to check multiple different apps that my tickets were transferred there. I never received my tickets and now after the event has transpired I try to get my refund (mind you I was told by a representative that if I didn‚Äôt receive my tickets I would be refunded) and am being told that there is proof of transfer so I will not be getting a refund.   There was never any tickets I could have used to get into my event in any app or even on their website!   Worst ticket app ever! DO NOT USE!!!
Title: Less Than a Star

Content: I think it is terrible how these companies have gone 100% online. You cannot email, call, get a phone number or person on the phone. When people spend money on your company, they should be able to call and speak to an actual agent regarding their purchase. What a scam. Unfortunate. Content: I was told to ‚Äúverify my account‚Äù prior to buying tickets for an event. I did so, and when the time came to purchase tickets, this app/site wouldn‚Äôt let me, saying I was ‚Äúnot a verified fan‚Äù, even though I received an email and two text notifications that I WAS indeed verified. Entire situation was awful. Never received tickets. Will do literally everything in my power to purchase tickets from any other site than Ticketmaster.
Title: Buying tickets

Content: Ticketmaster is staying true to their sleezy history with this app. They have a ‚Äúshow price with fees‚Äù and even after checking that they still don‚Äôt show the actual price. That‚Äôs not an accident or but I‚Äôm sure but by company design, they‚Äôve been notorious for this for years. And seriously a 40% markup on the actual ticket price! What service are you really offering? I don‚Äôt think robbery is a service‚Ä¶
Title: still hides fees despite checking show real price

Content: Have nothing but problems with the app - I rarely use this and when I actually want to go get tickets, the app ALWAYS is taking that I‚Äôm a bot - so I guess if you only buy tickets once a year, you get this treatment where you have to jump through all kinds of hoops on the website to check and recheck passwords and resets and might get a 1 in 40 chance to actually login and get the tickets. Title: Can‚Äôt login once you close the app

Content: As a stroke survivor, music is a solace! Tried to enter info for purchase as quickly as possible ‚Ä¶ Unfortunately the website kicked me out due to time lapse. The ticket I originally wanted was no longer available ‚Ä¶ Then when I found another ticket, that was also in danger of being timed out till I asked my neighbor to enter my info ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Argh!!!

Content: How dare you post one Price on the event page and when you‚Äôre taken to the check out page the price increases 2x of what the price originally was shown to be. I pray they‚Äôll will be another manner to but even tickets! This app is a complete rip off! Processing and order FEEs?
Title: Money hungry liars

Content: I had tickets yesterday and when it got to the part for me to pay, Ticketmaster would not process the order! It was so frustrating! Then when I‚Äôd try to go back and buy them again it would say something like ‚Äúunfortunately, to be fair to all fans‚Ä¶‚Äù like I was buying tickets multiple times. That was not the case.
Title: Would not process order

Content: While I find this site easy to use, as someone who attends a lot of concerts. It would be nice if Ticketmaster offered some discount codes for some of the shows. It‚Äôs nice as a fan to be appreciated and acknowledged for keeping live music relevant especially in these times.

Content: They deliberately designed their ticketless system to only work with either your cell phone number or a landline phone number. They won‚Äôt let you use a Google Voice number. That‚Äôs what I normally give to all these spammy companies to avoid suddenly getting thousands of new spam calls. It‚Äôs a scam to get your info so they can sell your information, and Ticketmaster will absolutely sell it to everyone willing to pay.

Content: Ticket resale or scalping tickets is hurting the true fans of the artists. Premium seating somehow always end up in these companies hands to sell for double triple quadruple the sale price. I‚Äôm 58 and have attended hundreds of shows from the 70‚Äôs to present its been the same game. As far as the ease of Ticketmaster it‚Äôs great

We tried buying BTS tickets for two days to sit in the front, but the system kept failing and the good seats were all taken.  Extremely disappointed and hope Ticketmaster improves in the future.

I almost never got in and now I‚Äôm not even sure what my password is!

Content: The app "recommends" to "protect your ticket purchase" and makes it look like there is no cost for doing so; the other option is "no, thank you" which also has no cost listed next to it. Content: I would have liked the ability to view seats before placing the order plus it would mess up in entering information and had to restart several times

Content: Format changed?  What has happened?  Took long time to purchase a ticket for Birchmere.  I have been purchasing tickets for years on Ticketmaster.  For the first time I had terrible time trying to purchase a ticket for the Birchmere in Virginia.

Title: Wish I could use a laptop browser...

Content: So frustrating and infuriating trying to order tickets. Things keep crashing, we are being told they can‚Äôt process ‚Äúit‚Äôs not you it‚Äôs us‚Äùcrap. Such a headache. I wish there was another place to order tickets. üò°

Content: when trying to find a specific row or seat you have to scroll through all available in the same price range, and it doesn‚Äôt give any option to sort alphabetically or numerically. I wouldn‚Äôt have even used the app but I kept getting errors that I couldn‚Äôt use this device when trying the Ticketmaster website on both a mac or a pc.

Content: I‚Äôd rather take an ice pick and stab my kidneys over and over than ever order from TicketMaster ever again. I could regale you with my story of lost money, lost tickets, charged credit cards, and the worst customer service over ever experienced in my life. And I have DirectTV!!! Even if you have to drive 4 hours to get them, drive there and get them. That, is how much I‚Äôd avoid this company.   If TM had a cure for cancer (because TM is cancer), I‚Äôd be ok with dying a slow painful death before ever giving this company another penny of my money.   Trash, lies, and scams. Content: The virtual queue made it painless to buy tickets when first released. They also handled ‚Äúgetting in line‚Äù seamlessly.  It was very easy to select the seats and quickly check out. No issues.

Title: Good Tickets Can‚Äôt Pay

Content: I can‚Äôt go 5 mins on this app looking for tickets of a specific event without it glitching and giving me the error message: ‚ÄúSorry we are unable to find the event you are looking for.‚Äù  Even though I clicked the event that was listed on the specific date. Title: ‚ÄúCONSTANT ERROR MESSAGE: ‚ÄúSorry we are unable to find the event you are looking for‚Äù

Content: I kept being told I was a robot and when I tired to find help it was impossible. You have already answered question help that was zero help and getting a actual answer for a specific question was not a option.
