Title: Finding help and I‚Äôm not a robot

Content: Ticket Master always seems to be spot on with getting tickets notifications and making sure everything is just right. They always try to make your experience top-notch!!! The Sterling Critic
Title: Exceptional

Content: I remember the days when ticket scalping was ilegal. Now a days it‚Äôs almost impossible to buy tickets for an event, because by the time I log on to check tickets all the tickets are sold out and only the resells for 4times the price are available. The app works fine but the whole resell system has killed the enjoyment concerts.
Title: Ticket scalping

Content: Updated my phone number but it didn‚Äôt change.  Tried laptop site and literally got the timeout message in one second after I selected my seats.  No way the process could be completed in that window.  Happened repeatedly so must be a bug on your system.  üôÅ
Title: Trouble due to your system

Content: Sure, the app is easy to use, but when you need help. Forget about it!  It‚Äôs nearly impossible to get in touch with anyone, and if you do the answers are probably sent out by a robot, because they make no sense at all. But they sure are good at slamming on fees for your ‚Äúconvenience‚Äù of using the app‚Ä¶
Title: Horrible customer service

Content: Ticketmaster is an Excellent way to book special events for Family/Friends.   You'll be super excited, to see how easy and wonderful it is to have this app at your  Finger tips!! Enjoy many events!!
Title: Let the good Times began!!

Content: I have tickets for an event tomorrow and apparently I‚Äôm required to use the app for them to be redeemed. Funny each time I try to log in it says user error when I click the log in button. I‚Äôm not even given a chance to add my user name and password. This is an app issue bc I can log in on my computer but when I try to view my tickets it says that I must view them on the app. This is crap
Title: App log in issues and no way to contact

Content: Always has the tickets I‚Äôm looking for. Easy to navigate and easy to download tickets once purchased. I have never had a problem scanning my tickets with Ticket master like I have had with other services. Rock on with your bad self Ticketmaster
Title: The Ticket Master

Content: They deliberately held back floor seats to the coveted upcoming BTS concerts from actual fans, only to release them to sports fans during the stadium presale, only for the seats to all be bought up by these sports fans and re-listed them  for more than 10x their original price, oh and mocking us actual fans in the process. TM KNEW that they were withholding tickets from actual fans and that release them to the sports fans would cause extreme scalping. It should be illegal. It‚Äôs gross.
Title: Botched Pre Sales.

Content: I bought tickets to the animals as leaders show in Denver last week thinking they‚Äôd be there. They weren‚Äôt. Then I asked for a refund, partial or complete, and was told by support staff that the show was still scheduled to happen so they couldn‚Äôt refund me; this was on the day after the show with no reschedule in sight. Then, I stopped hearing back. Can‚Äôt call in because they don‚Äôt have staff supporting the call line. Total waste of time, money and energy.
Title: Crooks

Content: We were supposed to be refunded for a concert that was cancelled due to Covid. For some reason Ticketmaster refunded 2 tickets and moved 2 over to the rescheduled date (???). Even more confusing, we can‚Äôt move the tickets to our wallet and there are no barcodes. We‚Äôve sent >10 emails and chats and the response has been ‚Äúwe‚Äôre experiencing high volume, please see our FAQ page.‚Äù Don‚Äôt waste your time with this shady mega Corp
Title: Terrible customer service and glitchy app

Content: There was an error while I was completing my order. I purchased tickets but Ticketmaster didn‚Äôt process the order in time so I lost the tickets. When I went to contact customer service at 11am via phone, chat, and email I get a message that none are available. Even if people are working from home, how is there nothing available to fix this error? Never again will I use ticket master.
Title: Customer Service-none

Content: After successfully buying a few sets of tickets to Saratoga, I tried to buy two tickets to an upcoming college football game.  Three times in a row, the two tickets I reserved were taken by another buyer.  I don‚Äôt believe this for a second.  Once maybe, but three times in ten minutes?   Wound up getting a much better deal on the seats from StubHub.
Title: Tickets not available

Content: Ticketmaster has now changed their policy due to COVID-19 and now will not refund any tickets due to postponements. They also will not let me sell my tickets since I can no longer attend the event. Their customer service hung up on us when we called and I have since sent several messages trying to reach someone regarding this and no response. I am tired of shady business practices. I encourage you to buy your tickets elsewhere and not get sucked into this scam. I would give 0 stars if possible.
Title: TICKETMASTER IS A SCAM

Content: I was on line and waiting in the queue for 20 minutes prior to the presale for The Rolling Stones concert so I had great options for tickets. I selected my tickets and when I went to purchase, I kept getting a notification that it couldn‚Äôt be done from the device I was on and try to use an iPhone or laptop. Are you kidding me! I was on a computer and had to log out and log back in and wait all over again! Ended up costing me another 200 bucks on top of crappy seats!
Title: Frustrated

Content: Absolute trash ticketing system. They make you wait in line and then present you with dozens of tickets, none of which are actually available. ‚ÄúAnother fan beat you to it!‚Äù Well then why the hell are you showing it to me if it is not available? Go back to the old way of having people wait in line and then giving them the option to buy secured seats. Somehow an already scummy company has managed to make their user experience even worse.
Title: Absolute trash

Content: Tried countless times to order tickets to Bill Engvall. Used the app on my phone and it just hung after seat selection. Same thing using browser (3 different ones) and the app on my iPad. Finally tried on the iPad with the VPN turned off and got it to work. Not sure why it did not work on the oPhone as the VPN was not engaged. The whole TM backend seems to be wonky as I tested it by going for tickets to a different event and had no problems.
Title: Finicky app

Content: Tried several times to secure  my two tickets but the site was not working properly.  Frustrating and irritating fees are charged but site is not properly set up or there are glitches
Title: Frustrating

Content: The site shows tickets available and I keep trying to purchase tickets and the sale will not go through!!! Tied multiple seats, different web browsers and the APP. Same issue every time. They authorize $1 on my card but the same NEVER completes! Then you can only call customer service if you have an existing order! The absolute worst site. This is the problem with a monopoly for original ticket purchase. Ticketmaster is truly a terrible company.
Title: Poor site ZERO CUSTOMER service

Content: Ticketmaster makes too much money to not have a properly functioning app. I‚Äôm so annoyed I‚Äôm coming out of my way to write this review. The app is great when it works the issue is - it RARELY WORKS. It‚Äôs a struggle to sign in, and the app will randomly sign you out. Nothing loads. You click on a heart button and it doesn‚Äôt work. Like what‚Äôs the point of the app if it‚Äôs not going to work. I‚Äôd rather purchase from the venue direct going forward then deal with this.
Title: Frustrating Experience from a big company app

Content: I attempted to use my Discover credit card to pay. It wouldn‚Äôt let me submit it. It kept asking me to enter my name as listed on the credit card. I did this numerous times and with different variations and it still didn‚Äôt work. I ended up losing the tickets I was trying to purchase and had to re-enter the website.  I ended up using PayPal to pay using the same credit card. Frustrating!
Title: Credit card

Content: I‚Äôm certain your app representatives who see these are good people but your company has a monopoly on eating dicks as well as ticket sales. I can only hope the fees that make up a third of the ticket price are reinvested in a corporate overhaul to fire your execs, instead of into toddler sweatshops, terror plots, and burning rainforests like I expect they are. I want to believe the bulk of the expense is returned to the musicians and the venues who support them but I‚Äôm also assuming you use the extra cash for champagne lube at your luxurious pegging parties. Cheers!
Title: Time for my annual review

Content: It is ridiculously hard to search for what you want, this app has proved completely useless I have no idea how it has such high ratings. Just use the website or use a better ticket vendor...
Title: Horrible Navigation and Search Options

Content: Using this app is akin to playing hide-n-seek making its functionality an unnecessary aggravation. Whether it‚Äôs accessing your tickets for an event or selling tickets when you can‚Äôt attend, a process that should take no more than 30 seconds ends up being a 5 minute affair. I don‚Äôt have time for an Easter egg hunt when I‚Äôm in line to enter a venue. I‚Äôll always use wallet from now on for easy, quick access.
Title: Where are the account details?

Content: App is easy to use. Only suggestion would be to improve the functionality of allowing the user the ability to use the app in portrait or landscape mode. The app has trouble when using a table or mobile device. The app froze a few times when selecting seats for a sporting event.
Title: Ticketmaster App ease

Content: I bought tickets and later found out they were resale tickets. When I tried to print them out they were for the wrong date and time even though my receipt shows exactly what I thought I was purchasing. Ticketmaster said they would be back with me in 24 to 48 hours to correct the issue. I cannot get a single reply and I am out $300. I will NEVER use Ticketmaster again. How disappointing to be scammed by such a large, well known company.
Title: Expected more from a big company

Content: They charge more in fees than the actual ticket. Fees are not easily visible, total scam. When I tried to get my money back for the whole transaction when I realized I was charged more than the value of a ticket, I was given the run around. Fees have to be easily visible when booking tickets, not hidden that you have to fish for them, and displayed on the last page after the transaction was processed. Will never use them again! Very disappointed and frustrated! What a scam!?
Title: Horrible

Content: While finalizing my purchase the screen cycled until my time ran out to make the purchase. I was forced to complete this step three times. I hope this glitch can be fixed for the future usage of this site.
Title: Universal soul circus purchase

Content: I do enjoy Ticketmaster very much. However I do find that for certain concerts I am not able to choose my seating. I have to just go buy a section and row. I find this to be very disappointing and wish you would change back to where I can see what seats are available and in what section.
Title: Seating

Content: I just downloaded this app, and a different ticketing app. This Ticketmaster app is way easier and just plain better than the other one. Just bought $500 in concert tickets for the best band ever (DMB) and just wanted to say thanks for helping me build memories for the 33rd and 34th time seeing the band!  MH
Title: Easy and Awesome!

Content: Thank you ticket master! I have been to many concerts but never got a chance to get tickets before there were lawn seats and have been ripped off buying second hand tix & not knowing. I advise everyone to register for pre ticket sales. I finally got good seats for a reasonable price!
Title: Verified Fan

Content: The sole reason for 2 stars is readability.   Application is not user friendly for the vision impaired. Poor contrast, does not support dynamic font sizing or punch and zoom. To use the app, my wife and I had to use the magnifier in the wife‚Äôs iPhone to view the app on my iPhone.   My vision impairment, a very common one necessitates larger font sizing and better contrast to view electronic devices. Usually just zooming helps. Can‚Äôt do that from within this app.
Title: Not user friendly for the vision impaired.

Content: The app for Ticketmaster is the best!  It‚Äôs ease of use garners five stars for my money!  I always purchase tickets without a hassle and without having difficulty using this up to date technology!
Title: Ease of use garners five stars for my money!

Content: Ticketmaster customer support, or lack there of, is constant‚Ä¶Constantly bad! I always find myself being sent round & round to different areas of the app/website only to possibly find what I‚Äôm looking for. Its a 50/50 bet every time if I‚Äôll ever get what I need. The chat option is Always a great way to go to if u don‚Äôt mind waiting a few days for a reply‚Ä¶Try joining this century‚Äôs technology!
Title: Always a Frustrating experience

Content: I tried to purchase tickets for queen and Adam Lambert for both shows at Madison Square Garden. I waited in the queue, was directed to the terrible seats that were available and anytime I tried to choose my seats. It kept telling me another fan beat me to them. It would never refresh, and I must have selected 20 different seat, selections with the same outcome. Very disappointing and unhappy transaction
Title: Queen and Adam Lambert

Content: After securing my two seats, the payment process took almost an hour of repeating the submitting process with the same AMEX card on file again and again. Fix the backend system and stop raping your customers charging $95 per ticket service fees when your service is garbage.   You have a monopoly, that‚Äôs all. The youth is too mesmerized to realize that and blindly through money at the chance to have fun.
Title: Payment Processing Issues

Content: This Kali Uchis concert sold out within 20 minutes for both SF and LV. So why is it, not even a heart beat later, TICKETMASTER is selling RESALE tickets for 2-4x the amount? This means bots or scammers purchased these tickets for the sole purpose of resale and Ticketmaster purchased them and gouged the price. This is 100% poaching! Ticketmaster needs to limit their number of tickets they allow to be purchased AND not charge an exuberant amount more. Shame on Ticketmaster and all parties involved for not mitigating this better!
Title: Poaching

Content: I‚Äôve used this app many times and it has been a great way to find events that weren‚Äôt planning to go to and to buy tickets overall in general thank you Ticketmaster!!!
Title: Ticket purchase

Content: This is the biggest scam of a company. Why are we paying ridiculous fees when the servers can‚Äôt even work, the presale codes don‚Äôt work, and bots and scalpers get all the tickets? Even as ‚Äúverified fans‚Äù.   This company doesn‚Äôt sell to real fans, they rather sell to resellers that will continue to bring them in more income. It‚Äôs disgusting.   Let‚Äôs not forget they‚Äôve monopolized concerts so this is the only company we can truly go through.
Title: More like Ticketscammer

Content: It won‚Äôt let me log in no matter what I try, deleting and redownloading, turning my phone off, restarting wifi, etc. When I go to sign in all it gives me is a blank white screen that never loads anything more. I‚Äôve been trying to log in for days now. And of course the browser site won‚Äôt work to let me put my tickets on my apple wallet. So annoying and basically a useless app since I can‚Äôt get into my account
Title: GLITCHES

Content: I use this app all the time since I love going to live shows. But for some reason my favorites no longer appear when I go to my favorites list. But if I log into the website I see them. It‚Äôs just not the same because the app would tell you which ones of your favorites had upcoming shows. Someone please tell me how to fix this problem
Title: Lost my favorites

Content: This app and Ticketmaster as a whole is a complete scam. It‚Äôs corporate grifting at its peak with hidden fees and over inflated ticket prices. Ticket master is complete and utter garbage. They resell tickets adding tons of fees when you buy or sell them. Not to mention they add price to the actual price of the ticket itself. It‚Äôs a company literally centered around scalping tickets. This practice is illegal if done on an individual level but ticket master gets away with it. Never using this trash company again.
Title: Scam app

Content: If you have an issue with the app (which you probably will since most concerts only accept digital tickets,) you have to jump through flaming hoops in order to deal with a real person in chat. Once you‚Äôre connected with someone in chat, they couldn‚Äôt care less about you or your situation, barely respond and go out of their way Not to help. Everything about the process is soulless and shameful.
Title: Incredibly unhelpful and rude

Content: They don‚Äôt let you transfer tickets, you have to sell through their site so they get even more money from people. The fees are ridiculous. When you‚Äôre trying to use the app to acquire presale or general sale tickets you get the spinning wheel of death until the event sells out. Wish Ticketmaster didn‚Äôt bully venues (or buy them) so that I never had to purchase through them again. I‚Äôd give negative 100 stars if I could.
Title: TM is the worst

Content: The Ticketmaster app makes it easier than ever to pay exorbitant and mysterious fees for concerts. It‚Äôs super simple now to see the 30% fees and service charges added on, shrug in disbelief, and then click the big green Purchase button.   Thanks Ticketmaster!
Title: Makes me feel complicit in ripping myself off

Content: As I was completing my purchase transaction and went to click purchase complete, it kicked me off the site for undisclosed reason. When I got back on the site, the closest thing I found to that section and number of tickets cost my almost an additional $200. Was not too happy about that but I got my RAIDER tickets!
Title: Robbed

Content: Ticketmaster, truly, has perfected the art of making attending an event as difficult (and expensive) as possible. Constant crashes, network errors (even at 2am!) and ridiculous verification loops and fees make for one of the worst app experiences on the market. I would shop literally anywhere else - if I could! But Ticketmaster has cornered the market on so many events that there are no other options. Ridiculously bad and embarrassing.
Title: Just Awful

Content: I wish we were able to see a suggested price to list our tickets based on past transactions to keep things fare for the buyer and seller. I also wish there was an auction/ buy now feature similar to eBay.
Title: Selling experience

Content: I haven‚Äôt been able to sign in through the app on my iPhone or iPad for months. All software on iOS and app is up to date. I can sign in from any computer just fine. Worst thing is that is be been locked out of my account multiple times because of the app failing to sign in while using all of the correct credentials and has caused me to miss out on presales. I can‚Äôt be the only one this is happening to??
Title: Sign In Never Works

Content: May have to wait a little while but customer service is friendly and extremely helpful
Title: Customer service

Content: The app doesn‚Äôt work. Don‚Äôt download because you cannot sign in. Avoid at all costs. It‚Äôs easier to contact the venue directly to get your tickets. Five star is just so they don‚Äôt hide this review.
Title: App doesn‚Äôt work

Content: Is there a worse consumer experience than TM? Repeatedly logging in, obscure error messages, ‚Äúmobile browser not supported‚Äù WHAT?! I‚Äôm using chrome on an apple device, does the dev team not plan for that? The barrage of ads. What‚Äôs the actual conversion on those? But above all, the worst is the amount of fees charged. It‚Äôs extortion. We know it, they know it, and it‚Äôs a shame venues were choked out by TM‚Äôs scale. They have to be amongst the top 5 most despised brands, and for good reason.
Title: The worst. Every time.

Content: Terrible service. Error messages all the time. Can‚Äôt complete the purchase because of technical issues with Ticketmaster. Says, ‚Äútry again later.‚Äù Terrible
Title: Error messages

Content: Over the last week I am unable to log in through the app. Click sign in and I get an error message before I can even enter my credentials. No issue with the full website. Frustrating when you‚Äôre standing in line at a show trying to access tickets
Title: Log in Error on App

Content: First I tried to purchase tickets on my laptop. I was told I could NOT use that device.  So I went to my iPad.  I could see theatre , so I picked Left Orchestra. I a side bar opened and showed the row only, and not the seats til purchased. So instead of getting one thing in the middle of the row, I got crap seats on far right feel I got hosed.
Title: Ticket Purchase

Content: I sent 2 tickets to my friend, and my other 4 tickets then locked up. After talking to customer service multiple times and providing information about the issue, they just stop responding for several weeks. I try to follow up and after another week or so they finally send me some canned emailed response asking for yet more information. It‚Äôs absurd that companies exist with this type of terrible support.
Title: Awful company

Content: The app has worked okay when I could just log in. But now it‚Äôs insisting I reset my password and emailing reset codes that expire before they hit my in box. Even if my general preference is for email notifications, it would be so much easier if you could choose how reset codes are sent, or if the codes didn‚Äôt expire so quickly.
Title: Reset codes expire before they reach me

Content: Quick Fast and no worry no issues no problems no drama there is nothing better than Ticketmaster if you don‚Äôt have you are probably still using a VCR LOL
Title: Quick Fast no issues problems or drama you can not beat this service with a drum LOL

Content: NFL, concerts. Mobile app makes it easy going. You can sell your tickets if your plans hit a snag. You can even narrow down your ticket right to the seat, even of verified reseller tickets I have to give them mad ups on this service. Well done
Title: Easy

Content: The app is convenient and better than the website. The only problem I have is the loading screen. If it takes awhile to load the pictures then you run the risk of the tickets ‚Äúexpiring‚Äù. So always make sure you have a good internet connection before starting the process.
Title: It‚Äôs better than the website

Content: I accidentally ordered the wrong concert they did a one time reimbursement so I could get the tickets I wanted my fault they were super nice to do this just be careful look over tickets couple times before buy they didn‚Äôt have to but I think it says a lot!!
Title: Me joe

Content: Worst app ever. I almost didn‚Äôt get seats to a show Im going to see. If a friend didn‚Äôt tell me that I needed to go onto the desktop site, I wouldn‚Äôt of gotten my tickets. I‚Äôm going to always see from now on other website. I‚Äôm still upset that I can‚Äôt go in through the app.
Title: DO NOT USE THE APP!!

Content: Wasted a lot of time selecting tickets that were shown, but then were not available once you clicked on the,.  Happened 15x for the REO concert in Orlando
Title: Annoying that the map shows tickets available when they are not

Content: Some companies actually care about their customers. Ticketmaster is not one. They only care about sucking every penny they can out of you and using leverage to force people to use them. I blame them for being horrible people but I blame any venue or event that uses them even more. And good luck buying tickets to something International on your phone. It will switch to that language even if you are in the US. Change the language setting and it just switches back. Idiots.
Title: One of the worst companies

Content: Overall the app is great, but there has to be a fix with error issues popping up after going ahead and wanting to purchase tickets on a laptop
Title: Ticketmaster Review

Content: The app is set up in such away that it will only show events near where I‚Äôm located not where I want to see the‚Ä¶I wanted to get tickets to see the SU vs Georgetown men‚Äôs basketball ball game which in DC this year and it kept informing me that it didn‚Äôt have that event!!! the so called convenience defaults aren‚Äôt convenient if I can‚Äôt get tickets for the event I want to attend!!!and yes I tried to change my location but it didn‚Äôt work!!!
Title: Tickets for a specific event not where I‚Äôm located

Content: Every time I use this app something goes wrong. It constantly rejects my password. I have had to reset my password for this app more than any other app. I search for bands and it gives me results in other cities unless I use the exact venue. And then there are the fees - I have bought $42 tickets that came to $78 at check out. I think the all-in pricing is helpful - a step forward at least
Title: Beyond fees, I hate this app

Content: App is good for all concert & sporting events. Really wish they had a feature were you can see the seat section view, that would help out a lot ! But other wise 5 stars.
Title: Best prices & reliable app

Content: So, you keep telling me my mobile tickets are ready to be added to my Apple Wallet, yet I go into the app and they only appear there with no option to add to Apple Wallet.  I‚Äôve received emails and notifications for the past week saying ‚Äúyour mobile tickets are ready - add them to your Apple Wallet‚Äù, yet I‚Äôm not able to lol. So what‚Äôs going on?  You‚Äôd think the fees you guys charge would be enough to make your app a seamless experience.
Title: What‚Äôs Going On?

Content: I‚Äôve used this app and website because it‚Äôs the only option, they don‚Äôt care if you have issues. I‚Äôve had to contact them with no luck on their chat or their 800 number that no one ever answers since it keeps going to a busy tone. The fans lose out on the experience to go and watch their favorite artists.
Title: Worst business for ticket purchasing. No one available to help with any issues

Content: I appreciate a safe way to buy tickets. My GF got tricked by a fishing website for another event once and wasted a bunch of money.   I wish the searching was better for discovering shows like just comedy shows in general. Lose one star.   They also lose a star for being a monopoly and strong arming venues/artist.
Title: Safe way to buy but‚Ä¶

Content: Charging a service fee of over $25 per ticket? For ordering via mobile AND my ticket is delivered only to my phone? Ticketmasters always been a joke for those of us with any sense, unfortunately they have monopoly over a lot of ticket distribution, so a lot of us have no choice but to go through it. I can‚Äôt wait for the govt to crack down on this shady business nickel and diming people to line their pockets.
Title: I do not understand how people give you 5*

Content: This app, much like Ticketmaster itself, doesn‚Äôt deserve the space in the world it exists. No live person ever responds to chat- I find it to be a useless feature. They don‚Äôt respond to disputes filed on the app but will certainly restrict your account when you put one in. The phone numbers listed on the app and online also never seem to have agents that answer. I can, with every ounce of my being say I absolutely LOATHE Ticketmaster
Title: What exactly DOES Ticketmaster DO?

Content: Bought tickets on the app on my phone for a concert. Concert was rescheduled to a date that I could not attend. However when I try to sell the tickets from the same device I bought them from, now it‚Äôs a problem. Contacted support and apparently you have to sell items from a computer.  Why do I need a computer to sell my item but you were so quick to take my money on mobile? Trash
Title: Money Wasted

Content: I can‚Äôt get over how much I love ticket master Ana their constant fight against scalpers. They literally implement verified fan., waiting rooms and try to get tickets to fans at the lowest possible price ! Thank you for ed Sheeran , Dallas cowboys , Dave ch√°pele and so many great acts.
Title: Ticketmaster is the only constant in my life üòÖüíØ

Content: Web sit is relatively easy to navigate. I feel secure ordering tickets from the site. But they are NOT transparent about the absorbent fees that will be tacked on to your ticket order.  I had to do a specific search to find a drop down menu, for a description of the MULTIPLE fees they added on to the base ticket price.  Fees that are OUTRAGEOUS. Adding an almost 50% surcharge for the tickets I purchased.  But this seem unavoidable, as they are the only seller for a lot of events I am interested in.   Concert ticket prices are through the roof.   I don‚Äôt mind paying the artist.  But the fees charged for a few clicks on the web site seems like price gouging.
Title: It is the only game in town for most events

Content: I selected to buy VIP tickets only to find at the gate that I had to unselect ‚Äúplatinum tickets‚Äù to actually get the tickets I intended to buy. Spent double the money for really bad seats. Total bait and switch.  They apparently had enough people upset about this that they changed how this works (you now have to select platinum rather than opt out, and it explains what platinum tickets are) but it was too late for me.
Title: Never ever buying tickets though then again

Content: So sad I have a great band to see Puscifer, and no option to pay extra to have tickets sent in the mail. Ticketmaster has me stuck with no option to use my phone for entry‚Ä¶ No ticket stub Ticket master sucky
Title: I collect tickets stubs for ROCK shows

Content: Ticketmaster is not only a wickedly evil company, forcing venues to sell tickets through them or risk being cut off of the Ticketmaster event system, charging an arm and a leg for fees, and not allowing for transferable tickets, but they also have a functionally useless app. This piece of junk doesn‚Äôt work well at all. I long for the days when Ticketmaster is finally brought down and I can actually enjoy live events again, but I fear that day will never come.
Title: Utter bull

Content: I click the sign in button to login, and I get an error message saying that ‚Äúuser has to be logged in.‚Äù Yeah, that‚Äôs literally what I‚Äôm trying to do. It makes no sense, please fix this bug.
Title: Can‚Äôt login

Content: I would love to see a day that Ticketmaster doesn‚Äôt tack on outrageous fees. I accept that I will need to pay a few extra dollars in service fees to purchase tickets off of an online platform. I hate that I am charged $30 extra dollars per ticket. A slap in the face to both the customer and the music venues. I would purchase elsewhere but most sites lead straight to Ticketmaster. Their monopoly is too strong. Greedy company.
Title: Outrageous Feed, Hate the Ticketmaster Monopoly

Content: Tried to log on to check on my tickets for an upcoming event so I could give my friend the right details, however the app wouldn‚Äôt let me log on. Didn‚Äôt even get the chance for a log in screen, just an error message saying ‚ÄúInvalid operation. UserManager not prepared for any login settings.‚Äù This makes no sense. Why isn‚Äôt your app equipped for customers to log in?
Title: Log in issue

Content: I find the app a little clunky to use:  1) it keeps logging me out, even though I tell ito keep me logged in. Without fail. What a pain. And 2) improve ability to find shows nearby. It‚Äôd be nice to have a map feature and the user can draw a circle to search for shows by genre or artist.
Title: Keeps Logging Out

Content: This app is easy to use and intuitive. I appreciate the configuration and usefulness of the controls. it allows me time to really plan and research before I make a purchase which makes the actual event smoother and more enjoyable.
Title: Good App

Content: That was terrible. If you‚Äôre going to have a monopoly on ticket sales at least get your act together. Lost my perfect seats because your app crashed. ThAnks for nothing.
Title: Lost my tickets because the app crashed!

Title: Ticketmaster Credit Card Processing

Content: In my years-long experience with Ticketmaster, I have maintained a consistent interpretation that it is nothing more than legalized scalping. Fee upon fee, jacking up the so-called price of tickets.  They‚Äôre a business, and I understand. Complicit in their ‚Äúbusiness‚Äù are the numerous businesses who contract with Ticketmaster. Businesses seem to no longer hold regard for their customers. They don‚Äôt care about the negative impact in customers‚Äô pocketbooks.   Beyond all of this is the commonly failed website and the subpar customer care. When there are failures, it is negatively stressful and time-consuming to obtain reasonable outcome.  All of the comments herein are based on my experiences with the firm. They are my words in response to transactions, attempted & consummated.   Readers are given a sage bit of advice: Caveat Emptor.
Title: Legalized Scalping

Content: Convenient for purchasing tickets on mobile device, a lot better than doing it in a browser, which is why I gave it 4 stars. However, load times for available seats are beyond bad. Just terrible! Work on improving your app performance please!

I was logged in the entire time with ‚ÄúWelcome William‚Äù at the top of the page.  Ticketmaster is horrible but they know they are the only game in town!

Content: I can‚Äôt get my head around the fact you spend less than $60 on 2 tickets and wind up paying $158. Back in the 80‚Äôs you would go to prison for that, now it is an accepted practice. What hurts even more is nowadays half the concert venues don‚Äôt even sell tickets to the average patron any more. You have to be some sort of clearing house to even get tickets. I remember the days when the Artists fought back against that stuff. Now it is just how business is done.

Content: Awful, awful, awful.  Ridiculous app and website that are painful to use.  Insane ticket fees on already insane ticket prices.  Dynamic pricing that should be illegal. Ticketmaster is a monopoly and they act like it.

Massive arenas and stadiums sell out within minutes and it‚Äôs obvious that the tickets are being scooped up in huge volume to be resold at a higher price. I‚Äôm sure this is good for Ticket Master as the extra transactions provide extra revenue, but we the consumers are paying the price.   I hope one day Ticket Master with focus on serving those who actually attend the events. The real customers.
Title: Broken Model

Content: TM has got to be one of the WORST companies around. Ridiculously high fees that shouldn‚Äôt exist. They just absolutely botched the Taylor Swift presale with many unable to ever get through and get tickets and most waiting hours for the chance to get tickets. TM is a monopoly that should not exist. I‚Äôm so happy whenever I buy tickets from a venue that doesn‚Äôt use TM who just gouge you with extra fees. TM, you earn this 1 star every time I buy from you.
Title: Money grubbing monopoly

Content: Ordering tickets and trying to resell them is unnecessarily difficult compared to other online shopping platforms.   The post purchase enticements for streaming services is annoying and predatory ‚Äì ‚Äì immediately after getting access to one‚Äôs credit card.
Title: Clunky and figity

Content: I sold a ticket 2 weeks ago and have yet to receive my payment even after following their instructions. Their phone line is always ‚Äúbusy‚Äù and their online robot only has options for like 3 basic automated replies and was no help. They said they would get in contact with me within 24-48 hrs but it‚Äôs been 5 days. Their email, website, app & twitter is no help. They don‚Äôt reply anywhere.

Content: Their ticket insurance company is a scam impossible to get any sort of refund they expect me to file documents for anything under the moon instead of just issuing a refund. On top of that Ticketmaster themselves has lack of customer service to the point where they don‚Äôt even have a direct phone number I‚Äôm out about $300 for events I could not attend one them which was rescheduled for two years later!
Title: Terrible

Content: I have tried a couple different online sites and nothing compares to how easy Ticketmaster is to use and the accuracy of the seat locations.   You know what you are getting with Ticketmaster!   Friends for life !
Title: I will only use Ticketmaster!

You pay for the tickets assuming you‚Äôll be able to see the event because it doesn‚Äôt say otherwise. You pay, then get your tickets and then see they are ‚Äúlimited view‚Äù seats and of course Ticketmaster has a no refund policy. Thanks for ruining the event for my 9 year son!

Content: The app is not allowing me to claim my own ticket. I can transfer to others but I cannot claim my own or transfer it to myself at another email address. I‚Äôve been trying for a day to contact someone through chat but they keep saying the chat isn‚Äôt available. The email contact has a response time of 48 to 72 hours. There is no phone support. This is unacceptable.

It took 2 days for us to understand that they thought I had 3 dots behind the url line ( the new Apple has a red arrow,) to get into Settings to  clear the browser. Then I had to delete my Ticketmaster app and reload it and Voila‚Äô it worked....
Title: Syncing Mac or I Phone

Content: I get that all companies have their own way of making money but seriously these fees are stupid costly. Like 36$ a ticket and then 2 something for a processing fee is absurd. I love using the app and all but y‚Äôall need to keep costs lower because god it drives me insane when the total for tickets goes up nearly 80 is just ridiculous. So please smarten up.

Content: I was ok using the app but every time I needed to check info in Safari or wanted to use another app like the calculator, the Ticketmaster app would reset where I was at to the home page so I couldn‚Äôt pick up with the tickets I was looking at
Title: Easy to Navigate but not easy switching apps

Content: An incredibly frustrating experience every time: click on tickets, load for 10 seconds, those tickets are gone, then re-enter parameters to try again ad nauseum, hoping to get lucky.   Ticketmaster, eventually you to accomplish something that doesn‚Äôt make everyone hate you (by luck, if nothing else), but this process isn‚Äôt it.

Content: It‚Äôs offensive that I purchase my tickets from a non-ticketmaster vendor only to be required to retrieve my tickets here. The fact that I cannot gain my [paid in full] tickets without forking over more of my sensitive data and downloading an app to view them is even more so. If the fees were not violating enough, ticketmaster finds a way to take advantage of the customer in other ways. Unethical business practices; a platform built to fill the requirements of garbage humans.

Tried to send an email and it wouldn‚Äôt do it because I supposedly hadn‚Äôt set up email. Yet I signed in under my email. It‚Äôs an iPhone app and it doesn‚Äôt work on an iPhone. Why do the idiots that wrote this software not get thrown in a dungeon?  I‚Äôm am so sick of this. Nothing works anymore!  And nobody cares to change it!!!
Title: Terrible

Content: How can TM get away w/ no competition?!? Just fleece us at will. Tried to buy tix at one price, app couldn‚Äôt connect with bank to validate CC on 1st try, and tix went up another $15 ‚Äîadding even more fees to that. Perhaps my own attempt to buy them before spiked the value. Will just go to ticket office from here on... LONG LIVE PEARL JAM and their crusade against this business

Content: 2 was less my single one was 3rd of the total of the 2. Wish had the option on the app to buy 3 of them as one purchase less fee

I tried 3, one being in the app, which basically just resulted in me having to pay a higher price to obtain tickets. $40 dollars more per ticket to be exact. Title: High demand concert? DONT USE THE APP!!!

Content: App will no longer let me log in. This has been going on for a month and they still haven‚Äôt fixed the error.

Title: No Apple Pay support in 2018 what gives ?

Content: Had to process this three times before the purchase went through...this was a frustration as the tickets were released and finalized with seats farther back than initially shown as available

Title: Carol Dulong

Content: I‚Äôm going to keep this short. Ticketmaster that‚Äôs become a monopoly over the last decade locking over competition and preventing venues from providing alternative cheaper access to tickets. Content: Bought my tickets on Ticketmaster and paid the processing fee required. Then life happened and I wasn‚Äôt able to go to the concert anymore so I decided to resell it on Ticketmaster. Once the tickets sold I got hit with another processing fee. So my $200 tickets had 2 processing fees of $40.   Oh and the buyer of the ticket had to pay processing fees of that much as well. So Ticketmaster pretty much gained 100% profit in processing fees. So buyers beware.

Content: I purchased tickets for the playoffs of a hockey game. The team got eliminated and the game was canceled. There is no customer service phone number and this app only provides the ability to exchange with artificial intelligence . Ticketmaster does not provide the ability to dispute charges. Buy tickets elsewhere.

Content: It will tell you transaction was not processed successfully while charge your card and issue ticket. Horrible horrible horrible!
